title: garofano_(path_to_nowhere)
body:
A playable character from [[Path to Nowhere]], her name Garofano is Italian for [[carnation]] flower, more specifically [[purple flower|purple]] or [[pink flower|pink]] carnations she is often associated/depicted with, matching her hair colour. Voiced by [[Inoue Kikuko]].

An A rank Sinner, otherwise known as the widow Mrs Braun, Garofano runs a tailor shop in the Eastside of DisCity prior to her arrest, she is secretly a skilled assassin of the Garden. Her alignment is Sloth.

Garofano has [[purple eyes]] and [[purple hair]], her hair is [[long hair|long]] and [[wavy hair|wavy]], typically partially tied up by a [[green hairband]]. She has a [[mole under mouth]] and wears a pair of [[green gemstone]] [[earrings]].

She wears a [[white shirt|white]] [[long sleeves|long sleeved]] [[shirt]] with a [[purple gemstone]] [[brooch]], a [[long skirt|long]] [[purple skirt|purple]]/[[black skirt|black]] [[hobble skirt]], and a pair of [[brown footwear|brown]] [[high heels|high heeled]] [[leather boots]]. Additionally she wears a [[green shawl]] with many spare [[buttons]] sewed on, a [[brown apron|brown]] single shoulder [[leather apron]] with [[sewing needle]]s, [[spool]]s of thread and a pair of [[scissors]] fitted, additionally she wears a [[tape measure]] on her neck like a scarf.

h4. Appearance

title: sumire_(path_to_nowhere)
body:
A playable character from [[Path to Nowhere]], her name Sumire is Japanese for [[pansy]] flower, though she is seen with all manners of [[purple flower]]s not limited to pansy. Voiced by Mano Ayumi.

An A rank Sinner, an [[ikebana]] artist from Eastside and secretly a skilled assassin of Garden, seen with all manners of blades long and short, as well as a signature weapon a bladed [[umbrella]]. Her alignment is Love.

Sumire has [[red eyes|red]]/[[pink eyes]] and [[very long hair|very long]] [[black hair]] in a [[hime cut]] style, wears a [[shuriken hair ornament]] on the right side of her head and has a [[mole under eye|mole]] under her right eye.

Wears a [[white kimono|white]] and [[purple kimono|purple]] [[two-tone kimono]] with [[chest sarashi]] underneath, a black [[obi]] with a blue [[obijime]] string, [[black ribbon|black]] [[neck ribbon]], a pair of [[black gloves|black]] [[artist glove]]s ([[partially fingerless gloves]]) and a pair of [[black footwear|black]] [[boots]].

title: bianca_(path_to_nowhere)
body: A playable character from [[Path to Nowhere]], introduced in the event Perfect Vote and the central story character of the event. Voiced by [[Hasegawa Ikumi]]. An S rank Sinner, brave, cheery and energetic, Bianca is an investigative journalist of DisTV News on the Eastside district of DisCity, also known by her online username Extra-Rich Apple Juice. Her alignment is Pestilence. Bianca has [[blonde hair]] and [[blue eyes]], her hair style is an [[updo]] held together by a [[black hairband]], decorated with [[apple hair ornament|apple]], [[cherry hair ornament|cherry]], [[strawberry hair ornament|strawberry]] and [[blueberry hair ornament]]s, her eyes as [[slit pupils]]. Has a [[snake tattoo]] on her left [[shoulder tattoo|shoulder]]. She wears a [[crop top|cropped]] [[black tank top]] and [[white pants]], left leg of her pants has a [[thigh cutout]], a [[white coat]] in a [[off shoulder]] manner, and a pair of [[black footwear|black]] [[toeless footwear|toeless shoes]]. Wears two [[chain necklace]]s and an [[ID card]] on a [[lanyard]], often seen holding both a recording [[camera]] and a [[can]] of apple juice. h4. body: A quote from a scene from the 1994 film [[Pulp Fiction]] where [[Jules Winnfield]] ([[Samuel L. Jackson]]) aims a [[gun]] at Brett (Frank Whaley) when he is unresponsive during an interrogation: [quote] Jules: What does Marsellus Wallace look like? Brett: What? Jules: What country you from? Brett: Wha-what? Jules: "What" ain't no country I heard of! They speak English in "What"? Brett: What? Jules: English, motherfucker! Do you speak it? Brett: Yes! Jules: Then you know what I'm saying! Brett: Yes! Jules: Describe what Marsellus Wallace looks like! Brett: What? I– Jules: Say "What" again! Say "What" again! I dare you – I double dare you, motherfucker! Say "What" one more goddamn time! [/quote] h4. title: ferret
body:
The ferret ([i]Mustela putorius furo[/i]) is the [[pet|domesticated]] form of the European polecat, a  member of the [[weasel]] genus [i]Mustela[/i].  Their fur is typically brown, black, white, or mixed.  They have long, slender bodies, with an average length of about 50 cm (20 in).

A group of ferrets is called a "business".

h4. Characters with pet ferrets

* [[Futaba Hotaru]] ([[Garou: Mark of the Wolves]]) - [[Itokatsu (Garou)|]]

title: samantha_reed_smith
body:
A character who appears in a mod for the visual novel [[Everlasting Summer]].

She is based on Samantha Reed Smith (1972 – 1985), an American schoolgirl and peace activist who became famous during the Cold War for writing a letter to the CPSU General Secretary Yuri Andropov, who replied with a personal invitation to visit the Soviet Union, which she accepted. Smith attracted extensive media attention in both countries as a "Goodwill Ambassador", becoming known as America's Youngest Ambassador.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Samantha Smith":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Samantha_Smith]
* "Russian website of Everlasting summer modification":[https://samanthamod.ru/]

title: rupee_(nikke)
body:
A playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: NIKKE]]. She is part of the Talentum squad along with [[Dolla (nikke)|Dolla]] and [[Yan (nikke)|Yan]].

A [[gyaru]]-esque Nikke, Rupee is Talentum's hottest star who frequently enjoy livestreams. Just like the other Talentum members, Rupee is named after the "Indian currency of the same name":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rupee].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] tied in a [[ponytail]] with [[green eyes]] and a [[fang]]. She wears an [[unbuttoned]] [[white shirt]] which exposes her [[cleavage]] and [[leopard print]] [[bra]], a [[yellow jacket]] tied [[jacket around waist|tied around her waist]], a [[yellow skirt|yellow]] [[checkered skirt]] and a pair of [[high heels]]. She wears black [[headgear]] that resembles ribbons but they're metallic, also wears several types of [[jewelry]] like a [[necklace]], [[hoop earrings]], and [[bracelet|bracelets]]. Usually with her [[sunglasses]] hanging on her shirt. Wears [[gold nails|gold]] [[nail polish]].

h4.Variants

* [[Rupee (Winter Shopper) (Nikke)|Winter Shopper]]

h4.Outfits

* [[Rupee (Rabbit Deluxe) (NIKKE)|Rabbit Deluxe]]

title: belorta_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. Squadmates with [[Mica (Nikke)|]]. The leader of the Carronades who is adorable and cuddly. She possesses above-average intelligence and has a soft spot for pulling pranks.

She has [[yellow eyes]], [[large breasts]], and [[medium hair|medium]] [[grey hair]] with [[short twintails]]. Has a [[shoulder tattoo]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves]], usually with [[binoculars]], a [[black shirt]] and [[red shirt]] with [[shoulder cutout]] and [[detached sleeves]], a [[black belt]], a [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[suspender skirt]], [[black thighhighs]]

title: corbeau_(madoka_magica)
body: Corbeau is an antagonist in [[Mahou Shoujo Tart Magica]] alongside her sisters [[Lapin (madoka magica)|]] and [[Minou (madoka magica)|]].
other_names: コルボー(魔法少女たると☆マギカ)

title: agent_47
body:
Main character of the [[hitman_(game)|Hitman]] video game series.

He is a [[bald]] [[muscular male]] with a [[barcode tattoo]] on the back of his head. He wears a [[black suit]] with a [[red necktie]].

He is a professional hitman and former top agent for the International Contract Agency (ICA), until he exposed agency information to the public, ending them permanently. His genetically engineered mind and body cause him to be considered the greatest [[assassin]] in the world. Agent 47 was created by Dr. Ort-Meyer as his 47th clone in his underground cloning [[laboratory]], disguised under the surface appearance of a sanitarium. 

His signature weapon is the chrome-finished [b]ICA19 Silverballer[/b] [[handgun]]. Its real-life counterpart is the AMT 1911 'Hardballer', an [[M1911]] clone.

Agent 47 is voiced by David Bateson.

title: kirigaya_suguha
body: A female character from [[Sword Art Online]].  She is initially mentioned as [[Kirito]]'s real life younger sister, but when Kirito is asked to give further details about her, he explains that she is actually his younger cousin who has been raised as his sibling.  She is a practitioner of [[kendo]]. She uses the avatar [[Leafa (sao)|]] in the fictional game Alfheim Online.

title: asada_shino
body: A female character from the [[Sword Art Online]] series.  She first appears in volume 5 in the Phantom Bullet story arc. Asada Shino uses the avatar [[Sinon]] in the game Gun Gale Online, and later also has another avatar named [[Sinon (sao-alo)|]] in the game Alfheim Online.

title: tyme_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Tyme[/b], known as [b]Thyme[/b] (タイム) in Japan, is the mathematics teacher at the academy in [[Pokemon sv|Pokémon Scarlet and Violet]].

Tyme used to be a Rock-type Gym Leader at Montenevera before passing the title and gym to her younger sister [[ryme (pokemon)|Ryme.]] She is a calm and helpful teacher, but she dislikes unprofessional behavior from her peers, often earning a lecture from her. She also avoids questions relating to why she quit as a Gym Leader. [spoiler] Tyme later participates in the Academy Ace Tournament. The final Pokémon she uses in battle is a [[terastallization|Terastallized]] [[Garganacl]].[/spoiler]

title: horkeu_kamui
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

"A warrior and Stray Transient who appeared from the world of Kamuykotan without the aid of a Summoner. He loves the human race and teaches them his warrior ways. This divine wolf currently resides among the militant Ikebukuro Berserkers in search of a human of the caliber of a hero who he can call Master. He wishes to instruct a hero for whom he can become both fang and shield. On the battlefield, he is a stern teacher and a tool to aid the work of a hero but during his daily life, he would completely spoil the Summoner he calls Master. He tends to become good friends with others who enjoy caretaking and housework."

h4. External Links

* "Housamo Wiki: Horkeu Kamui":[https://housamo.wiki/Horkeu_Kamui]

title: motoori_shiro
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A diligent second-year student from Shinjuku Academy who is also the representative of his class. He can be a bit stubborn but he has a wide range of knowledge and is highly intelligent. He loves the occult and is also a childhood friend of Kengo Takabushi. He's an avid reader but does not actually get along with people who rely on book-smarts.

Sometimes accompanied by [[Devil (housamo)|]]

Designed by [[BomBom]]

h4. External links

title: maria_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

The acting guild master of the Aoyama Missionaries, the biggest guild in the 23 wards. She is also the vice president of the Daikanyama Academy Student Council in Shibuya Ward. She leads the ever expanding Aoyama Guild, which spreads from Minato Ward to Shibuya Ward and is comprised of Transients who have fled from other areas. She is a plucky nun whose strong will enables her guild to resist all the harassment aimed at them from the neighboring Roppongi Guild. She's been involved with the guild since they were still a volunteer group that provided welfare for stray Transients. As she never acts out of self-interest, she does not get along with entrepreneurial types concerned with wealth.

Designed by [[BomBom]]

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Maria":[https://housamo.wiki/Maria]

body:

Her real life identity is Ayano Keiko. Her avatar and real life appearance are the same.

title: alice_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A young girl who constantly carries a stuffed animal she calls March Hare and treats the Transient Jambavan like a servant. She dresses up in gothic lolita coordinates and speaks strangely. Sometimes her words are harsh, sometimes fierce, but more often her utterings are rather garbled, confusing those around her. She looks as though she came straight out of a fairytale.

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Alice":[https://housamo.wiki/Alice]

title: bertolt_hoover
body:
A character from [[Shingeki no Kyojin]].

He is the 3rd best graduate of the 104th Trainees Squad. Bertholt is said to be very talented and knowledgeable but lacking in initiative. He is childhood friends with [[Reiner Braun]]. Originally wanting to join the Military Police, he changed his mind thanks to [[Eren Yeager]].
other_names: ベルトルト・フーバー

title: armin_arlert
body:
A character from [[Shingeki no Kyojin]].

Childhood friend of [[Eren Yeager]] and [[Mikasa Ackerman]] and one of the graduates from the 104th Trainees Squad. Physically weak and often prone to self-doubt, Armin did not make it inside the Top 10 of the 104th. Nevertheless, his heart and high intelligence make him a very valuable soldier. Declaring that he'd rather be dead than be a burden, Armin joined the Scouting Legion despite Eren's protests. He shares Eren's dream of exploring the world outside the walls.

Voiced by [[Inoue Marina]].
other_names: アルミン・アルレルト

title: hogen_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

An old Transient who teaches kendo at the police academy and also teaches kendo and swordsmanship at many schools around Tokyo. No one is better than he with the sword and his footwork is almost divine. Furthermore, his expertise in strategy make him a peerless all-rounder in battle. Even so, all his virtues are cancelled out by his penchant for being a hopeless perv. Every single word he utters is part of his next offensive statement. He likes people who are good with the sword or fun to tease.

Designed by [[Mennsuke]]

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Hogen":https://housamo.wiki/Hogen

title: mikasa_ackerman
body:
A character from [[Shingeki no Kyojin]].

The prodigy and top graduate of the 104th Trainees Squad and adopted sister of [[Eren Yeager]]. Mikasa is considered as an unprecedented military genius.

She is generally calm and somewhat frigid but interacts fully with others. She is overprotective of Eren whom she sometimes treats like her little brother. Childhood friends with [[Armin Arlert]]. Followed Eren's decision to join the Scouting Legion despite his protests.

Voiced by [[Ishikawa Yui]].

title: suzuka_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A Transient originating from the Land of Wa. She is a member of the Kabukicho Outlaws, a Guild for those lost and wandering with no other place to go. She was taken into the custody of the aging leader of the Kabukicho guild, which had previously almost been wiped out by Transient mobsters from a neighboring area. For this reason, she often thinks about what she can do for Kabukicho, and cannot abide any outsider who causes trouble in her territory. Her Sacred Artifacts are a set of three swords, which carry the power to kill even the undead when used together. She has an understanding and fondness for those who are easily misunderstood due to their appearances.

Designed by [[purasu no konbu]]

h4. External Links

* "Housamo Wiki: Suzuka":[https://housamo.wiki/Suzuka]

title: sasha_blouse
body:
[b]Sasha Braus (サシャ・ブラウス)[/b] is a character from [[shingeki_no_kyojin|Shingeki no Kyojin]].

The 9th best trainee from 104th Trainees Squad. Said to move like lightning and have uncanny intuition. However, her odd behavior creates difficulties in group operations. She's laid back and not very serious, and is very fond of eating or stealing food. Born on the mountains to a family of hunters, Sasha is quite knowledgeable about wild animals and experienced in the use of bow and arrow.

She is voiced by [[Kobayashi Yuu]] in the anime.

title: jean_kirstein
body:
[b]Jean Kirchstein (ジャン・キルシュタイン)[/b] is a character from [[Shingeki no Kyojin]].

6th best graduate from the 104th Trainees Squad. Excels in using the 3D Maneuver Gear and is somewhat of a leader even though his combat skills are not outstanding. Jean often directly speaks his mind, causing him to conflict with [[Eren Yeager]] due to their differing viewpoints. At first, wanting to join the Military Police, he changes his mind after the fall of Wall Maria and enlists in the Scouting Legion. Jean is visibly attracted to [[Mikasa Ackerman]] and is jealous of Eren's closeness with her.

He is voiced by [[Taniyama Kishou]] in the anime.
other_names: ジャン・キルシュタイン

title: reiner_braun
body:
[b]Reiner Braun (ライナー・ブラウン)[/b] is a character from [[Shingeki no Kyojin]]. 

Second best trainee of the 104th Trainees Squad. Reiner is very strong both in body and mind, and is respected a lot by his fellow soldiers. He is good friends with [[Eren Yeager]] and is childhood friends with [[Bertolt Hoover]]. Has a crush on [[Krista Lenz]].

He is voiced by [[Hosoya Yoshimasa]] in the anime.

title: annie_leonhart
body:
[b]Annie Leonhardt (アニ・レオンハート)[/b] is a character from [[Shingeki no Kyojin]].

4th best graduate of the 104th Scouting Legion. Ferociously strong despite her small build due to her mastery of the martial arts, Annie excels in combat but keeps distant from her comrades. Unlike many of the other top 10 graduates of the 104th, she does not join the Scouting Legion but joins the Military Police instead. Although generally cold, Annie becomes somewhat close with [[Eren Yeager]].

She is voiced by [[Shimamura Yuu]] in the anime.

body: [b]Miriam[/b], known as [b]Mimosa[/b] (ミモザ) in Japan, is the school nurse at the academy in [[Pokemon sv|Pokémon Scarlet and Violet]].

title: zero_(kirby)
body:
The true antagonist and final boss of [[Kirby's Dream Land 3]], who turns out to be the one controlling the [[Dark Matter (kirby)|]] monsters which were corrupting Pop Star.

It appears as a giant white orb with a single eye and is notorious for shooting projectiles made of its own blood at Kirby and even more for ejecting its eye in the final part of the battle.

Zero also appears (presumably) in [[Kirby 64]], as [[Zero  Two (kirby)|]].

h4. See also

body: Standard US IFV from the 1980s to present. Armed with 25mm autocannon as well as anti-tank missiles. Sometimes criticized for lack of armor and/or transport capacity.

title: jeunan_avertif
other_names: ジュヌーン・アパタイザ

title: shu_(bustafellows)
body:
Shu Lyn O'Keefe is a romanceable character in the otome visual novel [[Bustafellows]].

At 28 years old, Shu is a heavy smoker who makes a living as a bounty killer by eliminating other hitmen. He is a top-class martial artist and specialized in long-range sniping. The best sniper in town, he has no other goals in life apart from executing those on the list left behind by his foster parents and mentor.

title: teuta_(bustafellows)
body:
Teuta Bridges is the protagonist of [[Bustafellows]]

She's a 21-year-old freelance journalist working in New Sieg. As a child, she witnessed the murder of her brother, so decided to take up a life of journalism to maintain order and justice. She has a mysterious ability that allows her to leap in the past for a very short period into the bodies of others, using it to help those around her. She is a bright and cheerful woman with a positive personality. Although she is a reporter, she is not skilled at taking pictures.

Her first name can be changed at the beginning of the game.

title: limbo_(bustafellows)
body:
Limbo Scott Fitzgerald is a romanceable character from the otome visual novel [[Bustafellows]].

A 27 year-old Lawyer, Limbo is known for bringing justice to even the toughest criminals in the courtroom. Although named the crooked lawyer, he is extremely skilled, and is popular in the city and seen as a hero of the people. He plays by his own rules, serving justice to those who need tamed. Born into an extremely wealthy family, Limbo is kind at heart.

title: mozu_(bustafellows)
body:
Mozu Nile Shepherd is a romanceable character in the otome visual novel [[Bustafellows]].

At only 25 years old, Mozu is the chief of the autopsy department and works with the police force. Often misunderstood as apathetic and indifferent towards others, his way of thinking is usually from a medical point of view, which sometimes creates unexpectedly fun situations. Mozu talks to corpses and it is rumoured that he dissects animals as a hobby. He likes riding bicycles.

title: scarecrow_(bustafellows)
body:
Scarecrow is a romanceable character in the otome visual novel [[Bustafellows]].

A 22 years-old cyber-geek and computer hacker famous on the internet for hacking, money laundering and stealing. Thanks to his abilities and connections, he is a self-proclaimed underground boss.

title: helvetica_(bustafellows)
body:
Helvetica Orsted is a romanceable character from the otome visual novel [[Bustafellows]].

A 26 years-old plastic surgeon; Helvetica is popular in New Sieg. He appreciates the beauty in things and constantly rates passer-by women based on their looks. Highly confident in his skills, he believes that people can be reborn by changing their natural features.

title: xapan_illudas
other_names: ザパン・イリューダス

title: azuma_kaisen
body:
The "Three-legged Moon Seeker". Stage 3 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

A frog youkai who's one of [[Ogata Garaiya]]'s shikigamis. Has the power to gather financial fortune.

Kaisen is responsible and straightforward and thus, is often irritated at [[Kesa Kujiru]]'s impulsiveness. They hold their master Garaiya in high regard and often picks fights with Kujiru, since both want to be favored by their master. Both shikigami have a fierce rivalry and are often seen insulting each other. Kaisen also has a complex that they are more underdeveloped compared to Kujiru.

h4. See also

* [[Azuma Kaisen (frog)]]

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Kaisen Azuma":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Kaisen_Azuma

title: kuzu_suzumi
body:
The "Crafty, Treacherous and Superfluous Memory" and a hidden stage 6 boss of [[Len'en]]'s 4th game [[Brilliant pagoda or haze castle]]. An [[androgynous]] human who aims to kill [[Enraku Tsubakura]]. They have three personalities. 

[[Cine Hamal]] (nicknamed "Hamee" for short), depicted with [[blue eyes]], speaks in an effeminate and often suggestive manner. They love it when other people suffer, especially when that person is Tsubakura. 

[[Arde (len'en)|]] (nicknamed "Ardey"), depicted with [[red eyes]], is often annoyed at Hamee for their way of speaking and their tendency to deviate from their plans. They can be theatrical at times though.

[[Benny (Len'en)|Benny]] (not their real name), depicted with [[black eyes]], only has one line of dialogue at this present time, so it's hard to get a grasp of their personality.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Suzumi Kuzu":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Suzumi_Kuzu

title: kesa_kujiru
body:
The "Person Who is One, And Yet Many". Stage 2 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

A slug youkai who's one of [[Ogata Garaiya]]'s shikigamis. Has the power to make copies of themself, though they're not as strong as the original.

Kujiru is bratty, overconfident and impulsive. They hold Garaiya in high regard and often picks fights with [[Azuma Kaisen]], since both want to be favored by their master. Kujiru often ignores Kaisen's orders and does things on their own. Both shikigami have a fierce rivalry and are often seen insulting each other. 

h4. See also

* [[Kesa Kujiru (slug)]]

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Kujiru Kesa":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Kujiru_Kesa

title: ogata_garaiya
body:
The "Hero of the Masses". Stage 4 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

The leader of the Dragonfly Army and the owner of [[Azuma Kaisen]] and [[Kesa Kujiru]]. Garaiya is hopelessly idealistic and wants to find a ruler that would be a hero to Mugenri. Is currently supporting [[Taira no Chouki]] in their plans to become the emperor.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Garaiya Ogata":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Garaiya_Ogata

title: zoe_(league_of_legends)
body:
A humanoid Champion from Mount Targon in [[League of Legends]] usually played as an AP mid. Zoe is a cosmic entity; she acts as the cosmic messenger of Targon, heralding major events that reshape worlds. Her mere presence warps the arcane mathematics governing realities, sometimes causing cataclysms without conscious effort or malice.

Full title: [b]Zoe The Aspect of Twilight[/b]

h4. Alternate Skins

* [[Cyber Pop Zoe]]
* [[Pool Party Zoe]]
* [[Star Guardian Zoe]]

* [[Prestige Arcanist Zoe]]
* [[EDG Zoe]]
* [[Winterblessed Zoe]]
* [[Mythmaker Zoe]]

title: yomotsu_hisami
body: Beautiful Stalker of Hell First appeared in [[Touhou]] 19: [[Unfinished Dream of All Living Ghost]] as a boss and playable character. Hisami is a yomotsu-shikome who works directly under [[Nippaku Zanmu]]. Her job is to welcome people into Hell, from which they can never escape her grasp. It is stated that she does her job by offering people a cut of her payment, the amount of which is based on how many people she dragged to hell, and she gave the people she brought to hell the money she promised them. This method resulted in the people she dragged to hell to not hate her and making the Yama question if she did her job too well. In the events of UDoALG, she mainly acts as Zanmu's confidant, though she occasionally disobeys her orders in an attempt to make Zanmu mad. Due to her omake profile describing her relationship with Zanmu, alongside some choice dialogue (including panting in front of her and asking Suika how to make Zanmu look at her) coupled with her one-track obsession with making Zanmu scold her, fans have taken to depicting her as a lesbian masochist. h4. External links * "Touhou Wiki: Hisami Yomotsu":https://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Hisami_Yomotsu

title: nightmare_(soulcalibur)
body:
Main antagonist of the [[SoulCalibur|Soul]] series. He made his first appearance in [[Soul Edge]], with his proper debut being in SoulCalibur. With the [i]nom de guerre[/i] of the "Azure Knight," he is the host, wielder and living incarnation of the cursed sword, [[Soul Edge (weapon)|]].

Nightmare appears as a violent and ruthless creature covered in [[blue armor|dark blue armor]]. His prominent feature is his right arm, which has been twisted and transformed into large three-digit [[claws]] whose flesh overlaps his entire right arm and shoulder. He is depicted with Soul Edge in his [[left-handed|left hand]], symbolizing his polarity with [[siegfried schtauffen|Siegfried]]. Over the years, his appearance has progressively grown more and more demonic, as influenced by the state of Soul Edge itself. When unable to take possession of a corporeal body, Soul Edge can form Nightmare as a sentient suit of armor, though this is a desperation tactic.
other_names: ナイトメア(ソウルキャリバー)

title: kozakura_marry
body:
A [[Kagerou Project]] character. She is the fourth member of the Mekakushi Dan. Her mother is [[Kozakura Shion]], and she is the granddaughter of [[azami (kagerou project)|Azami]] and [[tsukihiko (kagerou project)|Tsukihiko]]. Voiced by [[Hanazawa Kana]].

Like her mother, she has [[white]], [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[long hair]] and [[pink eyes]]. In the anime, her default outfit consists of a [[frilled apron|frilled]] [[white apron]] worn over [[blue dress]] and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[boots]]. Sometimes Marry is seen wearing a [[bow hairband]] and [[key necklace]].

h4. Main songs

* [[Children Record (vocaloid)|]]
* [[Outer Science (vocaloid)|]]
* [[Souzou Forest (vocaloid)|]]
* [[Summertime Record (vocaloid)|]]

She has [[blue eyes]], [[black hair]] with [[sidelocks]] and a [[single braid]]. Wears [[round eyewear|round]] [[coke-bottle glasses]]. Her outfit usually consists of [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[red bow]], and [[pink vest|pink]] or [[black vest]].

title: shijou_mitsue
body:
A character from [[Kamichu!]]

She has [[straight hair|straight]], [[medium hair|medium]] [[parted hair|parted]] [[brown hair]] without bangs, and usually wears [[glasses]]. Her [[school uniform]] consists of [[short sleeves|short-sleeved]] [[serafuku]] with [[white sailor collar]], a [[red neckerchief]] and a [[grey skirt|grey]] [[pleated skirt]].

title: ikeda_chitose
body:
A [[Yuru Yuri]] character. As a member of student council, she is almost always seen with [[Sugiura Ayano]]. Though Chitose has a gentle disposition, whenever she takes her [[glasses]] off she has various [[yuri]] fantasies and almost always pairs [[Toshinou Kyouko]] together with [[Sugiura Ayano]] in those fantasies, which often lead to near-fatal nosebleeds. She speaks in soft Kansai dialect and likes pickles.

Chitose has [[blue eyes]], [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]] and wears ([[rimless eyewear|rimless]]) [[round eyewear|round glasses]].

She has [[green eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]] with [[swept bangs]]. Wears [[black-framed eyewear|black-framed]] [[glasses]] and [[hair bell]]s.

Her stage outfit consists of a [[blue jacket]], [[fur-trimmed jacket|fur-trimmed]] [[red jacket]] worn on the shoulder, [[blue skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt]] with a [[single stripe|single]] [[white stripes|white stripe]], and [[black footwear|black]]-[[yellow footwear|yellow]] ([[two-tone footwear|two-tone]]) [[boots]] with [[tassel]]s. Wields a [[bow (weapon)|]] decorated with a [[green gemstone]].

Voiced by [[Satou Hinata]].

title: lieutenant_colonel_william_kilgore
body:
[b]William "Bill" Kilgore[/b] (1921-) was a [[officer|Lieutenant-Colonel]] of the [[united states army|US Army]], and a commander of 1st Squadron, 9th Cavalry Regiment during the [[Vietnam War]]. He is a character from the 1979 film [[Apocalypse Now]].

In the film, Kilgore is often portrayed wearing [[aviator glasses|aviator]] [[sunglasses]], a [[campaign hat]], and a [[yellow ascot|yellow]] [[ascot]] inside his [[green shirt]] of the [[military uniform]]. See post #6258560 for reference.

h4. External links

* "Villains Wiki":https://villains.fandom.com/wiki/Bill_Kilgore
* "Wikipedia: Apocalypse Now#Cast":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apocalypse_Now#Cast

title: reinhard_tristan_eugen_heydrich
body:
[b]Reinhard Tristan Eugen Heydrich[/b] (7 March 1904 – 4 June 1942) was a high-ranking German [[waffen-ss|SS]] and police official during the [[Nazi]] era and a principal architect of the Holocaust. He gained various nicknames such as "The Butcher of Prague" and "The Blonde Beast".

In 1942, Heydrich was assassinated by two British-trained Czechoslovak resistance operatives.

h4. See also

* [[Tag Group:People]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Reinhard Heydrich":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reinhard_Heydrich

title: reinhard_heydrich_(dies_irae)
body:
[b]Reinhard Tristan Eugen Heydrich[/b] (ラインハルト・トリスタン・オイゲン・ハイドリヒ), also called by his Demon Name, [i]Mephistopheles[/i], is the leader of the Longinus Dreizehn Orden and the main antagonist in [[Dies Irae]]. He occupies the seat I in the Obsidian Round Table.

He is named after the [[Nazi]] officer [[Reinhard Tristan Eugen Heydrich]].

He has [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] and [[yellow eyes]]. His signature outfit consists of a [[white coat]], [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[necktie]], [[Sam Browne belt]], and a [[stole]] with [[runes|Runic text]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #3325933

h4. External links

* "Shinza Bansho wikia":https://shinzabansho.fandom.com/wiki/Reinhard_Heydrich

title: luka_(honkai:_star_rail)
body:
Playable character in [[Honkai: Star Rail]].

An optimistic and carefree member of Wildfire. He is the renowned boxing champion of the Belobog Underworld with a mixed martial arts prowess. His enthusiasm inspires other people, especially children, to dream big. 

He has [[blue eyes]], [[short hair|short]] [[red hair]] that may extend [[hair between eyes|past his eyes]], and commonly tied into [[ponytail]].

h4. Profile
[expand]
An optimistic and carefree fighter with a mechanical arm. Skilled in mixed martial arts and is a Wildfire member.

From the fight cage to the battlefield, and from a fighter to a warrior, Luka uses his strength to protect the people of the Underworld.

He wishes to bring hope to others precisely because he had experienced despair himself.
[/expand]

Hina has [[short hair|short]] or [[medium hair|medium]] [[pink hair]] pulled into two wide, [[low twintails]] that barely come up to her neck. She has [[sidelocks]] that come to her cheeks. Her eyes are [[purple eyes|purple]].

title: georgette_lemare
body:
[[Strike Witches]] character. A Witch of the [[502nd Joint Fighter Wing]], originating from Gallia. Her familiar is a Persian cat. 

Born to the owners of a small inn in Gallia, she developed her talents as a witch quickly during the evacuation of Gallia; her first combat experience as a new Sergeant coming as a result of escorting forces to the West African naval base of Dakar. Because of her tenacity in battle, exceptional defensive fighting technique, and her healing talents she was personally invited to join the 502nd by Flight Lieutenant [[Aleksandra I. Pokryshkin|Pokryshkin]].

Though not unskilled in the air, Georgette sometimes feels a girl amongst soldiers; she has a sweet disposition and a gentle soul, although she is not incapable: she is also world-wise, straight forward, and possessing common sense. Because of her childhood assisting her parents she is quite adept at performing general chores like sweeping or making beds.

Georgette is based off French flying ace Georges Lemare.
other_names: ジョーゼット・ルマール

title: perrine_h._clostermann
body:
[[Strike Witches]] character. A witch of the [[501st Joint Fighter Wing]], originating from Gallia. Her familiar is the Chartreux cat.

Perrine is a formerly wealthy (after devoting her savings and salary to the Gallian reconstruction effort) and proper fifteen year old Gallian girl who looks down upon some of the less-refined habits of her peers.

Perrine's magic ability, Tonnerre (雷撃 (トネール), Tonēru; French for "Thunder"), consists of a lightning based attack that expands outward from her location striking multiple targets within range. She has complained upon using the attack as it (presumably the electricity) messes up her hair.

Perrine is based on the French flying ace "Pierre Clostermann":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Clostermann.

Perrine has [[yellow eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] with [[blunt bangs]], and wears [[round eyewear|round]] [[glasses]]. Often having [[cat ears]]. She is commonly seen wearing [[blue jacket|blue]] [[collared jacket|collared]] [[military jacket]] with two [[chevron (symbol)|chevrons]] on each [[long sleeves|sleeves]], a [[white ascot]] and [[black pantyhose]].
other_names: ペリーヌ・クロステルマン

title: sata_kyouya
body:

Kyouya has [[red eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] with [[long bangs]] that extend [[hair between eyes|past eyes]]. His [[school uniform]] consists of a [[collared shirt|collared]] [[white shirt]], a [[striped necktie|striped]] [[red necktie|red]]-[[white necktie|white]] [[two-tone necktie]], a [[grey cardigan]], a [[blue jacket|blue]] [[blazer]] and [[black pants]].

She is depicted with [[brown eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] with [[parted bangs]] and a [[hairclip]]. 
Her [[school uniform]] outfit consists of a [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[blue bowtie]], [[grey vest|grey]] [[cardigan vest]], [[grey skirt|grey]] [[pleated skirt]] and [[black socks|black]] [[kneehighs]]. Often seen armed with an [[AKM]] or [[AKMS]].

title: kokonose_haruka
body:
A [[Kagerou Project]] character.

He has [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] that may extend [[hair between eyes|between eyes]], [[black eyes]] with [[bright pupils]], and a [[mole under eye]]. In the anime, his [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], a [[green cardigan]], and a [[black pants|black]]-[[blue pants|blue]] [[plaid pants]].

[spoiler]He is what [[konoha (kagerou project)|Konoha]] used to be. A friendly and sickly boy with a weak heart, Haruka was friends with [[Enomoto Takane]] and attended the same classes as her. He later befriends [[Tateyama Ayano]] and [[Kisaragi Shintarou]] (with Haruka confiding him about his terminal illness). He suffers a fatal [[heart attack]] in class while Enomoto wasn't paying attention, and in the Heat Haze world wishes for a stronger body. He gets this at the cost of becoming Konoha, losing his emotions and pain receptors in the process.[/spoiler]

title: narumi_sena
body:

Sena has [[blue eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] which may have [[blunt bangs]] and used to be tied into [[low twintails]].

title: b-ko_(shuuen_no_shiori)
body:
A character from [[Shuuen no Shiori Project]]. She is initially featured in a song by "150P":[https://vocaloid.fandom.com/wiki/150P] titled [i][[nisemono chuuihou (vocaloid)|Nisemono Chuuihou]][/i]. Her voice actress is "Touyama Nao":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nao_Tōyama].

B-ko has [[short hair|short]] [[brown hair]] with a [[red ribbon]] on the left side, and [[purple eyes]] ([[brown eyes|brown]]. In addition, she is the smallest of the four main characters. Like other female characters, her [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], a [[red necktie]], a [[double-breasted]] [[white jacket|white]] [[blazer]] with [[red trim]] (sometimes [[yellow jacket|yellowish]]), and a [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[plaid skirt|plaid]] [[red skirt]].

title: mochizuki_souta
body:
A character in [[Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai]] and particularly the Love Series, a student at Sakuragaoka High School, and the focus of [[Yakimochi no Kotae (vocaloid)|]].

Souta has [[black hair|black]] [[short hair]] with [[swept bangs]] and [[black eyes|black]]/[[brown eyes]]. Like the rest of characters, his [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], [[red necktie]], [[blue jacket|blue]] [[blazer]], [[yellow cardigan]] and [[blue pants]].

title: tateyama_ayaka
body:
A female character from [[Kagerou Project]]. Mother of [[Tateyama Ayano]] and the wife of [[Tateyama Kenjirou]]. Her occupation is an archaeologist. 

Ayaka has [[brown hair]] and dark [[brown eyes]]. Her hairstyle consists of [[ponytail]] with her bangs are being held in place by two red [[hairclip]]s. Ayaka's common outfit contains a [[black shirt]], a [[pink hoodie]] layered with a [[lab coat]] the same as Kenjirou's.

title: tateyama_kenjirou
body:
A male character from [[Kagerou Project]]. He is the [[father and daughter|father]] of [[Tateyama Ayano]], husband of [[Tateyama Ayaka]], and the homeroom teacher of [[Kisaragi Momo]]. He formerly taught [[Kokonose Haruka]] and [[Enomoto Takane]] in a class for physically ill students. 

Kenjirou has [[brown hair|brown]], [[parted hair|parted]] [[short hair]], [[black eyes]] and a [[stubble]]. He is usually seen wearing [[black-framed eyewear|black-framed]] [[under-rim eyewear|under-rim]] [[rectangular eyewear|rectangular]] [[glasses]], a [[lab coat]], and a [[striped shirt|striped]] [[collared shirt|collared]] [[red shirt]].

title: narumi_mona
body:
A character from [[Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai]]. She is the younger [[sisters|sister]] of [[Narumi Sena]].

She has [[bob cut]] [[short hair|short]] [[blonde hair]] and [[blue eyes]]. [[Blunt bangs]] are frequently depicted.

title: yamamoto_koudai
body:
A [[Kokuhaku Jikkou Iinkai]] character. He is a Sakuragaoka High School student in Class 1-1, and a member of the "Idiot Trio" consisting of himself, [[Enomoto Koutarou]], and [[Shibasaki Ken]]. His voice actor is [[Matsuoka Yoshitsugu]]. [[Lens Koshi no Keshiki (honeyworks)|]] is one of the [[HoneyWorks]] song focused on him. 

Koudai has [[black eyes]] and [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] that resembles [[bowl cut]] with [[arched bangs]]. He wears [[black-framed eyewear|black-framed]] [[glasses]]. Like the others, his [[school uniform]] consists of a [[blue jacket|blue]] [[blazer]], a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]], a [[red necktie]] and [[blue pants]].

title: todoroki_yousuke
body:
A character from [[High & Low]] franchise. He is a member of Oya High and the strongest of its full-time students.

In [[High & Low: The Worst]], he is portrayed having [[black eyes]], [[black hair|black]] [[straight hair]] with visible [[parted hair|parted section]], and wearing [[rectangular eyewear|rectangular]] [[glasses]]. His [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[collared shirt]] and [[black jacket|black]] [[gakuran]].

body:

h4. Featured songs

title: miracle_mallet
body:
A small magic [[mallet]] from Japanese folk tales. It is said that swinging the mallet grants its holder’s wishes.

h4.See also

* [[Issun-boushi]] - It plays an important role in this story.
* [[Sukuna Shinmyoumaru]] - This [[Touhou]] character is a descendant of [[issun-boushi_(character)|Issun-boushi]].
** [[Shining Needle Castle]], which was created by Shinmyoumaru's mallet a long time ago.
* [[Daikokuten]] - One of [[Seven Lucky Gods]]. His wooden mallet is called an Uchide-no-Kozuchi.
* Uchide no Kozuchi / Magical Mallet - A spell card in [[Yu-Gi-Oh!]] Trading Card Game.

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Uchide no Kozuchi":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uchide_no_kozuchi
* "Touhou Wiki: Miracle Mallet":http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Miracle_Mallet

title: daikokuten
body:
One of the [[Seven Lucky Gods]]. A Japanese syncretic deity loosely based on [[Mahakala]].

h4. See also

* [[Daikokuten (fate)]]
* [[Japanese mythology]]
* [[miracle mallet]]
* [[komedawara]]

title: chausses
body: Chausses were a Medieval term for [[leggings]], which was also used for leg [[armor]]; routinely made of [[chainmail|mail]] and referred to as mail chausses. They generally extended well-above the knee, covering most of the leg. Mail Chausses were the standard type of metal leg armor in Europe from the 11th to the 14th century.

title: rixia_mao
body: Recurring character in the [[Eiyuu Densetsu]] series and a major character in [[Zero no Kiseki]] and [[Ao no Kiseki]] duology.

title: agent_8_(splatoon)
body:
The [[Octoling player character]] for [[Splatoon 2]]'s DLC [[splatoon 2: octo expansion|Octo Expansion]] and [[Splatoon 3]]'s DLC [[splatoon 3: side order|Side Order]].

Can be an [[Octoling Girl]] or [[Octoling Boy]].

This agent's manga counterpart for the official [[splatoon (manga)|Splatoon manga]] is the male Octarian [[hachi (Splatoon)|Hachi]] and the female Octarian Nana.

title: ogin_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].  Introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|The Final Chapter]].

Tank commander and leader of "Ooarai":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters#dtext-tfc-ooarai]'s Team [[Shark]] in a [[Mark IV tank]].

Her name means silver, and is [[pirate]]-based like the other members of the [[sailor]]s group.

She bears the moniker, [i][[Tornado]][/i] (竜巻)[たつまき].

Her real name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Sakura Ayane]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]
[b]Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Shark (Naval Department team)[/b]

Newly joined to the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team, she boards the Mark IV as the tank commander of Team Shark. Gathered at the bar "Donzoku" at the bottom of the ship, she is the leader of the miscreants from the Naval Department. Her trademark is a long coat and a hat with a feather. Holds a pipe-shaped candy in her mouth. Her nickname is "Ogin the Tornado".

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]
[/expand]

title: mika_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank commander and gunner of a [[BT-42]], and overall commander of the "Keizoku High School":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Based on the character [[Snufkin]] from [[Moomin]].

Voiced by [[Noto Mamiko]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Keizoku High School

h6. Der Film

Commander of the Keizoku High School's tankery team and commander of a BT-42. Loves tulip hats, and is fond of the Kantele. From her easygoing and evasive manner, to the way she thinks and speaks, she befuddles those in her surroundings.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: youko_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|Das Finale]].

A member of the "Keizoku High School":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team. Nicknamed the "White Witch", in reference to [b]White Death[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a Finnish solder of WWII who is regarded as the world's deadliest sniper.

Based on the character [[The Groke]] from [[Moomin]].

Voiced by [[Wakayama Shion]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio (spoilers)]

h5. Keizoku High School

h6. Das Finale

A sniper known as the "White Witch" of Keizoku High School. [spoiler]In the second round, she killed Saunders flag tank from a distance.[/spoiler] Has a quiet and serious personality. She seems to be a little inflexible (Mika gossip).

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: pepperoni_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]], and introduced in the OVA.

Driver of a [[Carro Veloce CV-33]], and a Vice-commanders of the "Anzio":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is either based upon a popular pizza topping "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], or on the Italian word for bell peppers.

Her real name is unknown. 

Voiced by [[Taichi You]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Anzio High School

h6. OVA

Vice-commanding officer of the Anzio High School team.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1727159)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Vice-commanding officer of the Anzio High School team. Tank commander of a Carro Veloce CV-33 (though it is a two-seater). Has a rough personality and doesn't think deeply about things, she also makes a mess out of long thought-out strategies. Fondly calls Anchovy by the moniker "Nee-san".

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: oryou_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver for Team [[hippopotamus|Hippo]] in a [[Sturmgeschutz III]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname "Oryō" refers to Narasaki Ryō, wife of [b]Sakamota Ryouma[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] from the Bakumutsu period.

Her real name is [b]Nogami Takeko[/b] (野上 武子)[のがみ たけこ].

Voiced by [[Oohashi Ayuru]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Hippo (History girls team)

h6. Original Anime

In regards to the history of the Bakumatsu, she is unrivaled. She especially reveres Sakamoto Ryouma.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1291315)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Hippo's driver. Has detailed knowledge on the Bakumatsu, and admires Sakamoto Ryouma. Her real name is Nogami Takeko.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: suzuki_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Loader for Team [[leopon_(animal)|Leopon]] in a [[Tiger (P)]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based on the former Formula One racer [b]Aguri Suzuki[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Her full name is [b]Suzuki Maria[/b] [鈴木 真莉阿](すずき まりあ).

Voiced by [[Ishihara Mai]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Leopon (Automobile Club Team)

h6. Original Anime

A member of the Automobile Club. Her dream is to be "an owner of her own professional tankery team".

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1323452)[/tn]

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Leopon's loader. Dreams of becoming the owner of a professional tankery team.

title: nakajima_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander, radio operator and leader for Team [[leopon_(animal)|Leopon]] in a [[Tiger (P)]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based on the Formula One racer [b]Nakajima Satoru[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Her real name is [b]Nakajima Rera[/b] (中嶋 麗羅)[なかじま れら].

Voiced by [b]Yamamoto Nozomi[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Leopon (Automobile Club Team)

h6. Original Anime

A member of the Automobile Club.  Some people call her "Nakajima of the Rain" since she loves to walk around on rainy days.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1323450)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Boards the Porsche Tiger as the tank commander and radio operator of Team Leopon, i.e. those of the Automobile Club. Likes rally cars. Since she likes going out on rainy days, some have taken to calling her "Nakajima of the Rain".

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: nekonyaa_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander, radio operator and leader of Team [[Anteater]] in a [[Type 3 Chi-Nu]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her real name is [b]Nekota Mai[/b] [猫田 舞](ねこと まい).

Voiced by [[Kitamura Eri]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anteater (Online Tank Game Team)

Her team is formed from those she met in an online tank game: Momogaa and Piyotan. She is humble and meek.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1338697)[/tn]

h6. The Final Chapter

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Boards the Type 3 Chi-Nu medium tank as the tank commander and radio operator of Team Anteater, made up of friends of an online tank game. Is rumored to be beautiful with her glasses off. Her last name is Nekota.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: anchovy_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[Carro Armato P40]], and overall commander of the "Anzio":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based upon a popular pizza topping "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Her real name is [b]Anzai Chiyomi  (安斎 千代美)[あんざい ちよみ][/b].

Voiced by [[Yoshioka Maya]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Anzio High School

h6. Original Anime

Commanding officer of the Anzio High School team.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1620869)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Commanding officer of the Anzio High School team. Has difficulty with her cheerful and carefree team members, though she organizes them well. Is strongly praised by her members, being called "Duce (commander)" and "Nee-san" with friendliness. Although her real name is Anzai Chiyomi, she seems to prefer "Anchovy". Tank commander of a P40. In the match against the Selection University Team, she forcibly boarded the CV-33 as it's commander.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: cutlass_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].  Introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|The Final Chapter]].

Port loader and gunner of "Ooarai Academy":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters#dtext-tfc-ooarai]'s Team [[Shark]] in a [[Mark IV tank]].

Her nickname is a type of [[cutlass|slashing sword]], and is [[pirate]]-based like the other members of the [[sailor|sailors]] group.

She bears the moniker, [i]Fresh Whitebait [[Rice Bowl]][/i] (生 しらす丼)[なま しらすどん].

Her real name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Nanase Ami]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

[b]Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Shark (Naval Department team)[/b]

Newly joined to Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team, she is Team Shark's gunner. Though part of the many rough characters from Team Shark, she is the cool and silent type. At the bar "Donzoko", she stands at the counter as a bartender. Her nickname is "Cutlass the Fresh Whitebait Rice Bowl".

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: momogaa_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver of Team [[Anteater]] in a [[Type 3 Chi-Nu]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her real name is [b]Momose Taki[/b] [百瀬 多希](ももせ たき).

Voiced by [[Kurata Masayo]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anteater (Online Tank Game Team)

h6. Original Anime

She has experience with tanks online, but her experience driving the real thing is at the beginner level.  Nonetheless, she challenges to maneuver boldly with a virtuous strength of will.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1338702)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Anteater's driver. Her peach eyepatch is her charm point.

title: rosehip_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank Commander of a [[crusader_(tank)|Crusader]] on the "St. Gloriana":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based on Rosehip tea "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Her real name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Takamori Natsumi]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. St. Gloriana Girls College

h6. Der Film

A speed enthusiast at the noble and elegant St. Gloriana Girls College. Although she has admiration for Darjeeling-sama, a small slip of her unrefined manner reveals her true color's right away. Boards the Crusader Mk.III as the tank commander, and commands the Crusader corps overall.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: mikko_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].  

Driver of a [[BT-42]] on the "Keizoku High School":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Based on the character [[Little My]] from [[Moomin]].

Voiced by [[Ishigami Miho]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Keizoku High School

h6. Der Film

As a member of Keizoku High School, she works as the driver for the BT-42. Using a genius maneuvering technique, she was able to toss a M26 Pershing from the Selection University Team.

title: tsuchiya_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver for Team [[leopon_(animal)|Leopon]] in a [[Tiger (P)]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based on the profession racer "Dorikin", i.e. Drift King, [b]Keiichi Tsuchiya[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Her full name is [b]Tsuchiya Muuton[/b] [土屋 夢屯](つちや むうとん).

Voiced by [[Kitamura Eri]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Leopon (Automobile Club Team)

A member of the Automobile Club. Has the nickname of "Drink Bar Friday (Dorikin*)" because she loves Friday's drink bars.

[tn]* Dorikin can also mean drift king[/tn]

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1323457)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Leopon's driver. Likes to drift. Because she likes the drink bars at Friday's, she is called "Dorikin".

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: piyotan_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Gunner of Team [[Anteater]] in a [[Type 3 Chi-Nu]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her real name is [b]Hiyoshi Aoi[/b] [日吉 葵](ひよし あおい).

Voiced by [[Uesaka Sumire]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anteater (Online Tank Game Team)

h6. Original Anime

As she is good at socializing, she is invited by Nekonyaa and Momogaa to join the team. All three met together for the first time offline.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1338706)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Anteater's gunner and loader. Her camping in elementary school trained her body enough to handle a tank shell with one hand.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: saemonza_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Gunner for Team [[hippopotamus|Hippo]] in a [[Sturmgeschutz III]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname "Saemonza" refers to [b]Sanada Saemon-no-Suke Yukimura[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] from the Sengoku Period.

Her real name is [b]Sugiyama Kiyomi[/b] (杉山 清美)[すぎやま きよみ].

Voiced by [[Inoue Yuka (seiyuu)|]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Hippo (History girls team)

h6. Original Anime

There is no one more knowledgeable in the Warring States Period of Japan. Her favorite food is Sanada Konetsuke Mochi (a dish from the Warring States Period).

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1291311)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Hippo's gunner. Well versed in the Warring States Period of Japan. Favorite food is Sanada Konetsuke Mochi. Her real name is Sugiyama Kiyomi.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: erwin_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander and radio operator for Team [[hippopotamus|Hippo]] in a [[Sturmgeschutz III]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based on [[Erwin Rommel]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] from [[world war II|WWII]]. 

Her real name is [b]Matsumoto Riko[/b] (松本 里子)[まつもと りこ].

Voiced by [[Moriya Satomi]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] .

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Hippo (History girls team)

h6. Original Anime

Really into the history of Europe, especially Germany. She's personally biased towards World War II.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1291307)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Hippo's tank commander and radio operator. Admires the German army general Erwin Rommel, with her strong point being European military history. Her real name is Matsumoto Riko.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: azumi_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]]

Tank commander of an [[M26 Pershing]] and one of the squad captains of "Selection University":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters.html#dtext-df-university]. Alumni of "BC Freedom High School":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters.html#dtext-tfc-bc-freedom].

Her full name is unknown. She has a name connection with the "other squad captains":[#dtext-see-also], as their names all end with "mi".

Voiced by [[Iida Yuuko]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Der Film

One of three squad captains of the university selection team. She specializes in the "Bermuda Attack" which is a collaboration of three people. Boards an M26 Pershing.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

[i]Same as [b]Der Film[/b].[/i]

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

h4#see-also. See Also

title: rum_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].  Introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|The Final Chapter]].

Primary driver of "Ooarai":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters#dtext-tfc-ooarai]'s Team [[Shark]] in a [[Mark IV tank]].

Her nickname is a type of [[alcohol]]ic beverage, and is [[pirate]]-based like the other members of the [[sailor]]s group.

She bears the moniker, [i]Explosive Cyclone[/i] (爆弾 低気圧)[ばくだん ていきあつ].

Her real name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Takamori Natsumi]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]
[b]Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Shark (Naval Department team)[/b]

Newly joined to Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team, she is Team Shark's driver. She's not actually drinking, but she's always blushing like a drunkard. Also features a red frizzy-haired afro. Is fond of calling Ogin as "boss". Her nickname is "Rum the Explosive Cyclone".

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]
[/expand]

title: murakami_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].  Introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|The Final Chapter]].

Starboard loader and gunner of "Ooarai":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters#dtext-tfc-ooarai]'s Team [[Shark]] in a [[Mark IV tank]].

Her nickname refers to the Murakami navy "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], and is [[pirate]]-based like the other members of the [[sailor|sailors]] group.
She bears the moniker, [b][i]Sargasso[/i][/b] (サルガッソー) "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].
Her real name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Taichi You]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]
[b]Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Shark (Naval Department team)[/b]

Newly joined to Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team, she is Team Shark's gunner. The tallest member of Team shark, with strong muscles. Her wear of the uniform is orthodox, and at first glance appears serious, but even among the members of ruffians she is especially cheerful. Her nickname is "Murakami the Sargasso".

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]
[/expand]

title: kawanishi_shinobu
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Kasai Masae[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Kirimura Mari]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Has a positive nature, but is also quick to temper. Despite her fierce expression, she has a good personality.  Is the Attacker.

[tn]Source: post #1291299[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Duck's driver. Her position is attacker. Is calm and patient. Her arm control has gotten better through all of the matches.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: sono_midoriko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander, secondary armament gunner/loader and leader for Team [[duck|Mallard]] in a [[char_b1|Char B1 Bis]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team. Also a member of the Public Morals Committee.

Her nickname is [b]Sodoko[/b] (そど子), and the origin of both her name and nickname come from the story of Sodom and Gomorrah from the Old Testament.

Voiced by [[Izawa Shiori]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Leopon (Public Morals Committee Team)

h6. Original Anime

A Public Morals Committee member.  Has a mid-length bobbed haircut. Is methodical in nature.

[tn]Source:  "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1312396)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Boards the Renault B1 Bis as the tank commander of Team Mallard which consists of Public Morals Committee members, where she performs as the Tank Commander, secondary armament gunner, and secondary armament loader. Usually holds an inflexible persistence with the rules, but her demeanor can also be influenced by her surroundings. Seems to get along with the chronically tardy Mako for some reason. Her nickname is Sodoko.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: konparu_nozomi
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Main armament gunner/loader for Team [[duck|Mallard]] in a [[char_b1|Char B1 Bis]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team. Also a member of the Public Morals Committee.

Her nickname is [b]Pazomi[/b] (パゾ美)[ぱぞみ], and the origin of both her name and nickname come from Pier Paolo Pasolini, the director/writer of the Italian movie "Salò, or the 120 Days of Sodom".

Voiced by [[Izawa Shiori]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Leopon (Public Morals Committee Team)

A Public Morals Committee member.  Has a short-length bobbed haircut. Her hobby is movie appreciation.

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Mallard's main armament gunner and radio operator. Her bob cut is the shortest. Her nickname is Pazomi.

title: tamada_tamaki
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].   

Tank commander of a [[Type 97 Chi-Ha]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Yonezawa Madoka]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

Member of the Chi-Hatan academy tankery team. Boards the Type 97 medium tank (new cannon model) as the tank commander.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

A new Chi-Ha tank commander. The most hot-blooded girl on the team. Is the leading life of the party at Chi-Hatan. Her favorite saying is, "I won't want, until we win" ([tn]It was a wartime slogan encouraging thrift and endurance, supposedly thought up by a little girl, though apparently actually by her father.[/tn]).

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: hosomi_shizuko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank commander of a [[Type 97 Chi-Ha]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Nanase Ami]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

A member of the Chi-Hatan tankery team. Commander of a Type 97 medium tank (with a 57mm gun).

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Former tank commander. A lancer of Chi-Hatan and a fashionable person. Has a surprisingly calm side. A Showa romanticist who loves Shinshu's famous Sanzoku-yaki and mood songs.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: hamada_kiyo
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank commander of a [[Type 97 Chi-Ha]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Inoue Yuka (seiyuu)|]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

A new Chi-Ha tank commander. Does well in both tankery and Urasenke's school of tea ceremony "[2]":[#dtext-external-links]. She may seem graceful, but she also has a sarcastic streak with a lot of unexpectedly pessimistic remarks. Her favorite writer is Edogawa Ranpo "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: ikeda_emi
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

title: teramoto_tomiko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Radio operator of a [[Type 97 Chi-Ha]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Hayama Ikumi]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

Former Chi-Ha (Hosomi tank) radio operator. Public relations officer for Chi-Hatan Academy's tankery. Her nickname is the Imperial Headquarters. She is also in charge of playing music to inspire her companions. Likes Narazuke ([tn]vegetables pickled in sake lees[/tn]).

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: kubota_rin
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank commander of a [[Type 97 Chi-Ha]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Taichi You]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

Former Chi-Ha tank commander. Strong in geography and numbers and is a theoretical scholar. Her hobbies are coloring and chiyogami ([tn]decorative paper with colorful patterns/figures[/tn]). She is quite good at Gunjin Shogi "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] and Chi-Hatan style Go, but she really likes Daifugō "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] of Trumps.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: nishihara_yasoko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|Das Finale]].

Tank commander of a [[Special Type 2 Launch Ka-Mi]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Inoue Yuka (seiyuu)|]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Das Finale

Type 2 Ka-Mi tank commander. Patient and faithful to the mission. She is good at swimming and a master at [i]noshioyogi[/i] (ancient style of swimming). Due to her hairstyle, she is called [[zashiki-warashi]] #1 by everyone.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: hasegawa_tatsu
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|Das Finale]].

Driver of a [[Type 95 Ha-Gou]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Ise Mariya]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Das Finale

Driver of a Type 95. 元気はつらつ。おこわご飯が大好物だけど餅はそんなに好きじゃない。今一番食べたいものは、福田から教えてもらった「たらし焼き」

title: hirai_hanako
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|Das Finale]].

Gunner of a [[Type 95 Ha-Gou]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Anzai Chika]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Das Finale

Gunner of a Type 95. 泣き虫だった自分を変えようと、最近ブラジリアン柔術を習い出した。あこがれの必殺技は「フロントチョーク」。正直言って、弱い。

title: chouno_ami
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Member of the [[japan_ground_self-defense_force|JGSDF]] and initial tankery instructor at Ooarai Girls Academy, and drives a [[type_10_(tank)|Type 10]]. Also acts as an official for the "Japanese Tankery League":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters.html#dtext-jtl].

Voiced by [[Shiina Hekiru]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Tankery instructor at Ooarai Girls Academy. A Captain sent from the Ground JSDF Fuji School Tank Corps; a rough approximation of her character is shown by how she frequently creates a stir amongst the tankery students at Ooarai Girls Academy.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

[i]Same as [b]Original Anime[/b].[/i]

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: maruyama_saki
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Loader of Team [[Rabbit]] in an [[M3 Lee]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Maruyama Karina[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [b]Kumagai Saki[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], two members of Japan's national soccer team.

Voiced by [[Komatsu Mikako]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Often spends time musing by herself; she's a quiet one.  Her favorite foods are Kitsubana and Kelp tea.

[tn]Source: post #1727145[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Rabbits secondary armament (37mm) loader. Almost always quiet and facing one direction, though keep an eye on her as occasionally she'll point out an insight that will save the team.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: sawa_azusa
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander and leader of Team [[Rabbit]] in an [[M3 Lee]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Homare Sawa[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [b]Azusa Iwashimizu[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], two members of Japan's national soccer team.

Voiced by [[Takeuchi Hitomi]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Takes good care of the Freshman team as its leader.  Has a cautious nature.

[tn]Source: post #1291320[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Boards the M3 Lee medium tank as the tank commander of Team Rabbit, made up of only Freshman. She is caring and often pulls the team together. Although amongst the members that easily get carried away, she is careful and prudent.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: isobe_noriko
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander, loader and leader of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team. Also the Captain of the Volleyball Club.

Named after [b]Isobe Sata[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Kikuchi Mika]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Is staking it all on tankery in order to revive the Volleyball Club. For her role as Setter, she practices tosses everyday.

[tn]Source: post #1291296[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team.  Boards the Type 89 I-Gou Kou as the tank commander and loader of Team Duck, i.e. those of the former Volleyball Club. A hot-blooded girl engaging in tankery in order to revive the volleyball club. As a Setter, she practices tosses every day, with her motto being "[b]GUTS[s] [/s]!![/b]".

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: oono_aya
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Secondary Armament Gunner of Team [[Rabbit]] in an [[M3 Lee]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Oono Shinobu[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [b]Miyama Aya[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], two members of Japan's national soccer team.

Voiced by [[akina_(seiyuu)|Akina]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

An endlessly enthusiastic glasses-girl. Her personal hobby includes the collecting of interesting cell-phone straps.

[tn]Source: post #1291328[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Rabbit's secondary armament (37mm) gunner. A twintails with a bright personality. Her glasses break often during matches.

title: yamagou_ayumi
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Main Armament Gunner of Team [[Rabbit]] in an [[M3 Lee]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Yamagou Nozomi[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [b]Kaihori Ayumi[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], two members of Japan's national soccer team.

Voiced by [[Nakazato Nozomi]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

title: utsugi_yuuki
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Radio Operator of Team [[Rabbit]] in an [[M3 Lee]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Utsugi Rumi[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [b]Nagasato Yuuki[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], two members of Japan's national soccer team.

Voiced by [[Yamaoka Yuri]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

The persevering type of person that can endure until events are settled. Despite this, she's still easygoing. Has charming thick eyebrows.

[tn]Source: post #1291327[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Rabbit's radio operator and main armament (75mm) loader. Has an easygoing pace. Always being made fun of by Aya saying "Yuuki's an idiot, huh?".

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: sakaguchi_karina
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver of Team [[Rabbit]] in an [[M3 Lee]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Sakaguchi Mizuho[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [b]Maruyama Karina[/b] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], two members of Japan's national soccer team.

Voiced by [[Tada Konomi]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

Her school of thought is to act without thinking. Her hobby is anime appreciation. Hard drive space is always a concern.

[tn]Source: post #1291326[/tn]

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Rabbit's driver. Loves anime SFX. Acting before she thinks, a girl that will do it if it can be done.

title: sasaki_akebi
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Gunner of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Named after [b]Sasaki Setsuko[/b] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], a member of the 1964 Japanese Olympic gold-medal winning team.

Voiced by [[Nakamura Sakura]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Original Anime

A gentle personality with lots of patience. The hairband holding back her forelock is her main charmpoint. Her role is the Blocker.

[tn]Source: post #1291300[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Duck's gunner. In volleyball, blocking is her specialty. Has a high degree of accuracy, but due to the weakness of the gun she has trouble getting effective shots in.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: kondou_taeko
body:

Radio Operator of Team [[Duck]] in a [[Type 89 I-Gou]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Yoshioka Maya]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].
