Works hard at everything, but at times cannot read the atmosphere. Her headband is her trademark.  With her forte being the Jump Serve, will decide things when it counts with a Service Ace.

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Team Duck's radio operator. With her trademark red headband, she is good at the jump serve. She also has the role of the calm tsukkomi.

title: takebe_saori
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Radio Operator of Team [[Anglerfish]] in a [[Panzer IV]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her [[catchphrase]] is やだもー (Yada mo~, [tn]Good grief~[/tn]).

Voiced by [[Kayano Ai]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anglerfish

h6. Original Anime

She idolizes the concept of romance and connects everything in the world to it in her mind. She thought she would be popular if she took tankery, however ...

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1283979)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Belongs to the Ooarai Girls tankery team.  Team Anglerfish's radio operator.  The new Student Council Public Relations officer.  Has dreams of yearning for love, however she adores the underclassmen and takes care of them with good cooking.  Contributes to the team through high communication skills such as being good at fast texting and also by acquiring an amateur radio license.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: isuzu_hana
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Gunner of Team [[Anglerfish]] in a [[Panzer IV]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Ozaki Mami]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anglerfish

h6. Original Anime

She is a genuine Ojou-sama, born into a family of flower arrangers, but feeling dissatisfied with her own flower arrangements, she chose to participate in tankery.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1283974)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Belongs to the Ooarai Girls tankery team.  Team Anglerfish's gunner.  The new Student Council President.  Although the gentle daughter of a respectable flower-arranging family, she is participating in tankery in order to add vigor to her flower arrangements.  The strength of her heart being authentic, she demonstrates a high ability as a gunner with the concentration she cultivated in flower arranging.  Acts the calm straight man to Saori that tends to daydream.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: akiyama_yukari
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Loader of Team [[Anglerfish]] in a [[Panzer IV]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Nakagami Ikumi]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anglerfish

h6. Original Anime

Loves nothing more than tanks! She uses that knowledge to help the team. In admiration of Miho she joined the team.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1283986)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Belongs to the Ooarai Girls tankery team.  Team Anglerfish's loader.  The new Student Council Vice-President. The daughter of a family that runs a barber shop on the Ooarai school ship, she has liked tanks ever since she was little. In addition to her ability as a loader, she contributes to the team with her rich knowledge on tanks plus the dedication to scout out other teams by herself. She respects Miho from the bottom of her heart.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: nishizumi_maho
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[Tiger I]], and overall commander of the "Kuromorimine":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

More specifically, she commands Tiger 212, the same tank commanded in real life by the highly decorated panzer ace "[1]":[#dtext-external-links], Michael Wittman "[2]":[#dtext-external-links], alluding to her own status as a tank ace in the GuP universe.

Voiced by [[Tanaka Rie]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Kuromorimine Girls Academy

h6. Original Anime

Having distinguished herself as the successor to the Nishizumi School of Tankery at a young age, she is Miho's older sister. She serves as the commanding officer of the Kuromorimine Girls Academy team. As a strong international player, like many celebrities she has been taken up by the media.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1291874)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Having distinguished herself as the successor to the Nishizumi School of Tankery at a young age, she is Miho's older sister. She serves as the commanding officer of the Kuromorimine Girls Academy team. As a strong international player, like many celebrities she has been taken up by the media. She has decided to study abroad in Germany.

[tn]Source: "[5]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: nishizumi_miho
body:
The main protagonist of the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander and leader of Team Anglerfish in a [[Panzer IV]], and overall commander for "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Fuchigami Mai]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anglerfish

h6. Original Anime

She was born into the distinguished family of the Nishizumi-style of Tankery, but she changed schools to Ooarai Girls Academy intending to run away from Tankery.  However, perplexingly enough, she was extorted into joining Tankery by the student council.  A junior in high school that considers her friends feelings more than anything else.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1283978)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Overall commander for the Ooarai Girls tankery team, and boards the Panzer IV Ausf.H (originally Ausf.D) as the tank commander.  Second daughter of the Nishizumi family which heads the Nishizumi-style of tankery.  Following the 63rd National Tankery Tournament, she led the team to victory against the Selection University team and secured the existence of the school.  Has a warm personality, but when faced with a problem, is able to put together flexible tactics that go beyond the limits of the Nishizumi-style.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: reizei_mako
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Driver of Team [[Anglerfish]] in a [[Panzer IV]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Iguchi Yuka]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Anglerfish

h6. Original Anime

Is a genius at the top of her class.  But, due to her habitual tardiness in the morning she has insufficient credits, and so she is pursuing Tankery in exchange for credits.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1283975)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Belongs to the Ooarai Girls tankery team.  Team Anglerfish's driver. Has excellent grades, but due to low blood pressure is weak in the mornings. With her genius she was able to master the controls with high degree of maneuverability just by reading the manual, and manipulates the Panzer IV freely according to Miho's intent. A childhood friend of Saori, she loves eating desserts and going to bed.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]
[/expand]

title: flint_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].  Introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|The Final Chapter]].

Secondary driver and radio operator of "Ooarai":[/wiki_pages/list_of_girls_und_panzer_characters#dtext-tfc-ooarai]'s Team [[Shark]] in a [[Mark IV tank]].

Her nickname refers to old [[flintlock]] guns, and is [[pirate]]-based like the other members of the [[sailor|sailors]] group.
She bears the moniker, [b][i][[waves|Surge]][/i][/b] (大波)[おおなみ].

Her real name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Yonezawa Madoka]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]
[b]Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Shark (Naval Department team)[/b]

Newly joined to Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team, she is Team Shark's driver and radio operator. A tall slender woman who looks looks great in a long skirt with side slits. Is good at karaoke, and always shows off her beautiful voice on the stage of of the bar "Donzoko". Her nickname is Flint the "Surge".

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]
[/expand]

body:

title: 2020_summer_olympics
body:
The Summer [[Olympics|Olympic]] Games of 2020, held in the city of Tokyo, Japan. Initial tentative dates were 24 July through 9 August 2020.

On 24 March 2020, the games were postponed until 2021 due to the [[Coronavirus Pandemic]]. They took place instead from 23 July to 8 August, 2021, although the "Tokyo 2020" nomenclature was still retained.

This tag is for images that use branding for this edition or even parodies of events at the opening ceremonies, especially the manga-inspired Parade of Nations.

h4. See also

* [[Miraitowa]] - official mascot
* [[Olympics pictogram parody]]

title: helmet-chan_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls Und Panzer]].

A mob character from the "Saunders":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team, given the fan nickname Helmet-chan (ヘルメットちゃん) since every portrayal has her wearing a distinctive United States tanker helmet from World War II.

She is the loader for an [[m4 sherman|M4A1 Sherman]] commanded by "Alisa":[#dtext-see-also].

Her real name is unknown.

title: rukuriri_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[Matilda (tank)|Matilda]] on the "St. Gloriana":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is a type of tea from Kenya.

Initially an unnamed mob character with several nicknames, she was eventually given the official name Rukuriri. At first she was given the fan nickname Ushiroda ([tn]Ushiro=Behind, Da=Common Last Name Ending[/tn]) due to the scene (Episode 4, ~10:15-10:45) where she thinks Team Duck was hiding in a garage in front of her, only for them to appear behind her from the floor. When she realizes this, she shouts "後ろだ (Ushiro da)", which means "They're behind us", which also provided the genesis for her fan name.

Voiced by [[Kurata Masayo]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. St. Gloriana Girls College

h6. Original Anime

Tank commander of a Matilda. In a school styled with elegance she has an unusually hot-blooded nature, and her tone of voice is also rude. Supports the front lines with a high degree of competency.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

[i]Same as [b]Original Anime[/b].[/i]

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: kojima_emi
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[Jagdpanther]] on the "Kuromorimine":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Initially an unnamed mob character with several nicknames, she was eventually given the official name Kojima Emi. She was given a fan nickname Ritaiko ([tn]Ritai=Tank Treads, Ko=Girl[/tn]) due to the frequency with which she has to change the tank treads during her appearance. She is also called Naoshita-san (直下さん) due to her quote "直したばっかりなのに! (I just fixed it!)".

Voiced by [[Hayama Ikumi]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

title: katsuya_megu
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[Panzer III]] on the "Kuromorimine":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Voiced by [[Uesaka Sumire]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Initially an unnamed mob character with the nickname Sangou-san ([tn]Sangou=Type 3[/tn]) due to her being the tank commander of a Panzer III, she was eventually given the official name Katsuya Megu. She also has the fan nickname of Ahako ([tn]Aha=laugh, ko=girl[/tn]), due to her laughter being impressive.


[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Kuromorimine Girls Academy

h6. Das Finale

Tank Commander of a Panzer III. She was easily defeated in the summer battle versus Ooarai due to getting carried away. Like Hida Ema, she was in a state of shock at the time, but quickly recovered after Erika bought her a parfait. She loves sweets, and her favorite is baumkuchen.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: geshiko_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[Panther (tank)|]] on the "Kuromorimine":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

A mob character, she was given the fan nickname Geshiko ([tn]Geshi=Kick SFX, Ko=Girl[/tn]) due to her being the Panther tank commander that gives her gunner a lot of kicks at ~9:37 in Episode 11 of the anime. She is based off of the character [[Bauer]], with the same iconic ahoge as can be seen in the same episode when scrolling frame-by-frame at ~9:39.

Her real name is unknown.

title: clara_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank Commander of a [[T-34-85|T-34/85]] on the "Pravda":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

She is from [[Russia]] and frequently speaks [[russian_text|Russian]].

Her full name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Jenya (seiyuu)|]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Pravda High School

h6. Der Film

A Russian studying abroad at Pravda High School. She adores Katyusha. Talks mainly in Russian with Nonna, but is actually fluent in Japanese. Serves as the tank commander of a T-34/85.

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: katyusha_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Tank commander of a [[T-34]], and overall leader of the "Pravda":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based upon the [[Russia]]n song of the same name "[1]":[#dtext-external-links]. Her real name is unknown.

Often mistaken for a loli because of her short stature and [[flat chest]], but she is in fact 17 at the time of her first appearance in the GuP anime.

Voiced by [[Kanemoto Hisako]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Pravda High School

h6. Original Anime

Commanding officer of the Pravda High School team. Since she always gets remarks on her short stature, she is called the "Tiny Tyrant".

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1291870)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

title: caesar_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]].

Loader and leader for Team [[hippopotamus|Hippo]] in a [[Sturmgeschutz III]] on the "Ooarai Girls Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Her nickname is based on [[Julius Caesar]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] from the Roman Republic.
[tn][b]Note:[/b] "Caesar" in Japanese follows the original Latin, not English, pronunciation, so the 'C' is a hard 'k' (and not a soft 's') and the 'ae' is pronounced 'ah-eh' (both short vowels, no silent 'a').[/tn]

Her real name is [b]Suzuki Takako[/b] (鈴木 貴子)[すずき たかこ].

Voiced by [[Sendai Eri]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Ooarai Girls Academy / Team Hippo (History girls team)

h6. Original Anime

Leader of the "History Girls" team. Is partial to Roman history, as she's always reading books on it.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links] (post #1291302)[/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Affiliated with the Ooarai Girls Academy tankery team. Boards the Sturmgeschutz III Ausf. F, as the leader of the "History Girls" Team Hippo and performs as their loader. She likes history, being particularly familiar with Ancient Rome. Caesar is actually her soul name in the group, with her real name being Suzuki Takako.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: nishi_kinuyo
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].

Tank commander of a [[Type 97 Chi-Ha]], and overall commander of the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Thought to be named after the [[real life]] [[Iwo Jima]] [[tank]] unit commander [[Nishi Takeichi]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links] and [[Japan]]ese actress Kinuyo Tanaka "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

Voiced by [[Seto Asami]] "[3]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

Commanding officer of the Chi-Hatan academy tankery team. On the surface she's the hot-blooded type and doesn't listen to what people say which often leads to hasty conclusions. Feels some doubts about Chi-Hatan's traditional use of the charge. Boards the Type 97 medium tank (57mm cannon model) as the tank commander.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

Commanding officer of the Chi-Hatan academy tankery team. On the surface she's the hot-blooded type and doesn't listen to what people say which often leads to hasty conclusions. Often gives the cry of "tokkan" (battlecry) since it's a tradition of Chi-Hatan Academy. However, she has doubts about the effectiveness of the charge, and so listens to the opinions of Fukuda.

[tn]Source: "[5]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: marie_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|Das Finale]].

Tank commander of an [[FT-17]] and overall commander of the [[france|French]]-themed "BC Freedom Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

She is based off of [[Marie Antoinette (versailles no bara)|]] from the series [[Versailles no Bara]].

Her full name is unknown.

Voiced by [[Hara Yumi]]  "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Das Finale

Commanding officer of the BC Freedom Academy tankery team.  Has a gentle personality and likes sweets so much that she eats cake during the match.
Although she herself is an Escalator student, she does not seem to care much about the conflict between the Examination students and the Escalator group.
Commander of the flag tank, an [[FT-17]].

[tn]Source: "[2]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

title: aki_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].  

Loader for a [[BT-42]] on the "Keizoku High School":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Based on the character [[Moomintroll]] from [[Moomin]].

Voiced by [[Shimoji Shino]] "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Keizoku High School

h6. Der Film

As a member of Keizoku High School, she plays her role mostly alone in the turret for the BT-42 crew. Although she gets along with Mika, her philosophical dialogue doesn't make sense and is often confusing.

title: fukuda_haru
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_gekijouban|Der Film]].
 
Tank commander of a [[Type 95 Ha-Gou]] on the "Chi-Hatan Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

Thought to be named after Japanese author Teiichi Fukuda "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

Voiced by [[Oozora Naomi]] "[2]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h5. Chi-Hatan Academy

h6. Der Film

A member of the Chi-Hatan Academy's tankery team. Among the seniors who are devoted to the charge, she feels something from the way Team Duck of Oarai Girls Academy fights. Commander of the Type 95 light tank.

[tn]Source: "[3]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

h6. Das Finale

A Type 95 light tank commander. Among the seniors at Chi-Hatan Academy who are devoted to charge, she is looking for a better way to fight. It seems that having had an exchange with the Oarai Girl's Team Duck in the previous exhibition match and the match with the university selection team gave her that chance.

[tn]Source: "[4]":[#dtext-external-links][/tn]

[/expand]

title: oshida_(girls_und_panzer)
body:
A character from the series [[Girls und Panzer]] and introduced in [[girls_und_panzer_saishuushou|Das Finale]].

Tank commander of an [[ARL-44]] and vice-commander of the [[france|French]]-themed "BC Freedom Academy":[#dtext-see-also] tankery team.

She is based off of [[Oscar Francois de Jarjayes]] from the series [[Versailles no Bara]].

Her full name is [b]Oshida Ruka[/b] (押田 ルカ)[おしだ るか].

Voiced by [[Anzai Chika]]  "[1]":[#dtext-external-links].

[expand=Official Character Bio]

h6. Das Finale

Leader of the Escalator student group of the BC Freedom Academy tankery team. While admiring Marie from the same Escalator group as the Commander, she is always in conflict with Ando, an Examination student. In the match, she is the commander of an ARL44.

title: vault_girl
body:
Vault Girl is a mascot of Vault-tec, a major technological developer of the [[Fallout]] universe, before that world's atomic apocalypse. Vault Girl is the female counterpart to [[Vault Boy]].

She has [[blonde hair]] in a [[bob cut]]. In fanworks (particularly NSFW ones), she is also often depicted with [[huge breasts]] and in a [[unzipped]] [[vault suit]].

title: northern_ocean_princess
body:
Japanese name: [b]北方棲姫[/b] (Romaji [i]Hoppou Seiki[/i], literally "northern-dwelling princess")

E2 Stage boss of [[Kantai Collection]]'s Aleutian Islands / Midway Islands Summer 2014 Event. Also known as "Northern Princess", and based off "Dutch Harbor":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Dutch_Harbor].

The youngest by appearance of the [[Abyssal ship|Abyssal]] "Princesses", she is often depicted as the child character of said fleet. Due to similar appearances, [[Seaport Princess]] is often seen as the parent-like figure, and [[Airfield Princess]] as her elder sister. She is also shown together with [[Midway Princess]] and [[Aircraft Carrier Princess]], whose first appearances are in the same Summer Event. She is also associated with [[Ryuujou (kancolle)|]], as the Akutan Zero (see below) originally belonged to her.

The nickname ほっぽちゃん ("Hoppo-chan") comes from the first two kanji of her name (pronounced "Hoppo"). あくたん ("Akutan") comes from the "Akutan Zero":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akutan_Zero], a [[a6m_zero|Mitsubishi A6M Zero]] fighter plane which crashed on "Akutan Island":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Akutan_Island] but was recovered largely intact by the US following the Dutch Harbor campaign.

Her sudden overwhelming popularity led the developers to turn her into a mainstay for 3-5. Because of this, she also has numerous seasonal CG:

* Christmas 2014 (and onwards): Based on her "yelling" portrait, she wears an "abysallized" santa hat while carrying a present box (with an abyssal mouth, of course). Part of her machinery has turned into a christmas tree and her airplanes have been turned into ornaments.
* Rainy Season 2015 (and onwards): Based on her "running" portrait, she replaces her Zero plane with an abyssalized teruterubouzu and umbrella. She also appears to be looking at her umbrella instead of looking "at the viewer".
* Fall 2015 (and onwards): Based on her yelling portrait, she makes sign that there's no [[saury]] where she is (and indeed, you cannot gather saury from her) instead of yelling.
* New Year 2016: She happily holds some kagami mochi.
* Valentines 2016: She blushingly holds some fine chocolates in a box (with a mouth, of course).
* Sukiya Promotion: She is happily eating a serving of Sukiya's gyuudon while her hungry aircraft pleads for her to share some of her food.
* New Year 2017: She wears a furisode and haori set while her machinery has been replaced by abysallized versions of New Year paraphernalia.

Her catchphrase [i]kaere![/i] (カエレ！) is "officially translated":http://www.cospa.com/detail/id/00000065534 as "[[Go back!]]", but a popular alternate translation has it as "Go home!".

Voiced by [[Kanemoto Hisako]].

h4. See also

* [[Muppo]]

title: 2b_(nier:automata)
body:
The main protagonist of [[nier:automata|NieR:Automata]].

[i]YoRHa No.2 Type B[/i] or 2B is a female-model YoRHa android created to battle the machine lifeforms that have invaded the planet on behalf of the surviving humans. 2B is calm and composed, she does not encourage idle chatter on frivolous subjects and is generally reticent towards others. She also has high respect for the chain of command and rarely questions her orders. However, 2B occasionally expresses a notably sardonic wit in the face of certain situations and can even be hot-headed at times.

Her canonical attire includes a [[two-sided_dress|two-sided]] [[black dress]] with [[cleavage_cutout|cleavage]] and [[back cutout]]s and [[long_sleeves|long]], [[juliet_sleeves|juliet]] [[feather-trimmed sleeves]] under which is worn [[white leotard]] which shows off her [[huge_ass|ass]]. On her legs she wears [[thighhighs]] [[thighhighs_under_boots|under]] a pair of [[high_heel_boots|high heel]] [[thigh boots]]. On her head typically rests a [[black_hairband|black]] [[hairband]] on short [[white hair]]. Over her eyes is a [[black_blindfold|black]] [[blindfold]]. Occasionally throughout the events of the game her blindfold is removed and is thus sometimes [[no_blindfold|not included]] by artists. Her eye color is [[blue_eyes|blue]], and has a [[mole under mouth|mole under her mouth]].

She has an [[alternate color]]ed appearance in [[Soulcalibur VI]] and [[Final Fantasy XIV]] known as [[2P (nier:automata)|]]. In this appearance she has [[dark skin]], [[black hair]], and white clothes. 2B has made appearances in several other games, including [[Star Ocean Anamnesis]], [[SINoALICE]], [[Phantasy Star Online 2]], among others.

h4. See also

* [[2P (nier:automata)|]] (an [[alternate color]] version appearing in [[Soulcalibur VI]] and [[Final Fantasy XIV]])

h4. External links

* "Nier Wikia: YoRHa No.2 Type B":http://nier.wikia.com/wiki/YoRHa_No.2_Type_B

title: akiyama_mio
body:
A main character from [[K-On!]]

The [[left-handed]] bassist of the Light Music Club, playing a 3-Color Sunburst Fender Jazz Bass. The extremely shy Mio intended to go to Literary Club, only to be forced by her childhood friend [[Tainaka Ritsu]] into joining the band. While often trying to pose a confident exterior, her stage fright (ironically, she is also a vocalist in the event [[Hirasawa Yui]] can't sing) and phobia of anything disturbing makes her the target of Ritsu's pranks.

title: fujiwara_no_iyozane
body:
The "Anachronistic Ambitious Person". Stage 3 boss of [[Reactivate Majestical Imperial]].

A humble boater who works as a lackey for [[Taira no Fumikado]]. Fumikado promised them to make them a chief advisor if they helped with their plan to become the emperor of Mugenri. Has the power to cross over waves.

[[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]] reveals Iyozane was the first successor to the throne. However, they were locked under house arrest, and eventually killed by [[Ooama no Ake no Mitori]] (it is heavily implied they consented to this). For currently unknown reasons, they came back to life. Is relatives with [[Ooama no Ake no Mitori]] and [[Fujiwara no Shirogane no Sanra]].

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Fujiwara no Iyozane":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Fujiwara_no_Iyozane

title: zuifeng_tenkai
body:
The "One of the Old Dictators". Extra boss of [[Reactivate Majestical Imperial]].

[[Senri Tsurubami]]'s best friend and confidant. The two ruled over Mugenri with an iron fist until Tsurubami decided to leave for the Outside World and spirited away some humans from the Outside World to become their temporary replacements. 

Tenkai is a straightforward, often snarky person. They have the power to produce barriers, shared by [[Houlen Yabusame]], but due to a better work ethic they can use it far more effectively. Tenkai always wears bright green-yellow clothes, leading to fanon and people in-universe to compares them to a walking [[melon]].

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Tenkai Zuifeng":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Tenkai_Zuifeng

title: horikoshi_kouhei_(style)
body: [[Style parody]] of [[Horikoshi Kouhei]], the author of [[Boku no Hero Academia]].

title: xeno_a
body:
The "Eyes Forsaken by the Gods, but Loved by the World". Extra boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

A casino dealer working in Devanagara. Has the power to control probability, allowing them to succeed in any possible manner. Is rivals with [[Senri Tsurubami]], the only one who was able to defeat them.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Xeno a":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Xeno_a

title: amanomiya_jun
body:
The "Raincoat Between a Rock and a Hard Place". Stage 1 boss of [[Earthen Miraculous Sword]].

An [[androgynous]] rain youkai who sells umbrellas. Best friends with [[Amanomori Shou]], the two are very protective towards each other.

Jun is generally friendly towards others. Despite being a rain youkai, they don't like rain and moisture because it gets their rain gear wet. Jun likes to sing their own songs, but is embarrassed if they're seen singing by other people. 

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Jun Amanomiya":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Jun_Amanomiya

title: kokutenshi_hibaru
body:
The "Cheerful Debt Collector". Stage 4 boss of [[Earthen Miraculous Sword]].

An [[androgynous]] bird youkai working as a debt collector. Hibaru is very professional at their job, but surprisingly, they're bad at lying and pressuring people. Perhaps due to living for a long time, Hibaru is rather old-fashioned. Also, it seems Hibaru is hated for their job and is considered to be a "rotten executive".

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Hibaru Kokutenshi":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Hibaru_Kokutenshi

title: taira_no_fumikado
body:
The "Vessel for the New Emperor". Stage 5 boss of [[Reactivate Majestical Imperial]].

A human turned homunculus who's plotting to become the True Emperor of Mugenri. For it, they swapped bodies with the oni [[Para (len'en)|Para]] and indirectly killed their servant [[Taira no Chouki]]. Fumikado has [[Umatachi Tsugumi]] and [[Fujiwara no Iyozane]] working for them as lackeys, promising them huge positions of power if they help them become the True Emperor.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Taira no Fumikado":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Taira_no_Fumikado

title: amanomori_shou
body:
The "Walking Lubricant". Stage 2 boss of [[Earthen Miraculous Sword]].

An [[androgynous]] slug youkai who adores rain. Best friends with [[Amanomiya Jun]], the two are very protective towards each other.

Their personality is somewhat childish, and they often throw tantrums in an attempt to make it rain. They often go around with Jun, because Jun is a rain youkai and Shou can induce their own ability on Jun as they please.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Shou Amanomori":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Shou_Amanomori

title: kurohebi
body:
The "Strong-Willed Shadow". Stage 1 boss of [[Evanescent Existence]].

An [[androgynous]] artificial human created by [[Enraku Tsubakura]] and [[Kuzu Suzumi]]. Was abducted by [[Senri Tsurubami]] to the land of Mugenri. Kurohebi was created for the purpose of assassination, though they're bad at it.

Kurohebi is mostly interested in killing, since they were created for that purpose. They are normally indifferent to other people, but they seem to have respect for Tsubakura and Suzumi, considering them their parents.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Kurohebi":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Kurohebi

title: ooya_kunimitsu
body:
The "Royal Court's Youkai Exterminator". Stage 3 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

An androgynous human who was recently employed to be a professional youkai exterminator for the capital. Is childhood friends with [[Fujiwara no Iyozane]] and [[Ooama no Ake no Mitori]].

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Kunimitsu Ooya":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Kunimitsu_Ooya

title: celeritas_lumen
body:
The "Carelessly Converging Ray of Sunshine". Stage 3 boss of [[Earthen Miraculous Sword]].

An [[androgynous]] sunlight youkai. Lumen can absorb sunlight with the shell on their back. They can also absorb moonlight which makes them stronger, but it also makes them go berserk.

h4. See also

* [[Ex-Lumen]]

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Celeritas Lumen":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Celeritas_Lumen

Males wear a [[white shirt]] with [[puffy long sleeves]], a [[short necktie|short]] [[blue necktie]], a [[brown belt]], a [[pelvic curtain]], and [[blue pants]] [[pants tucked in|tucked into]] [[white footwear|white]] [[fold-over boots]].

Females wear a [[blue capelet]] with a [[gold trim]], a [[white bowtie]], a [[white shirt]] with [[puffy long sleeves]] and [[buttons]], a [[pleated skirt|pleated]] [[blue skirt]], [[white pantyhose]], and [[brown footwear|brown]] [[fold-over boots]].

title: umatachi_tsugumi
body:
The "Eggplant-Decorating Jockey". Stage 2 boss of [[Reactivate Majestical Imperial]].

A jockey youkai who was hired by to herd the spirits for the resurrection ceremony by [[Taira no Fumikado]]. Has the ability to to turn anything they sit on into a vehicle.

Tsugumi speaks in a heavy Kansai dialect. Though they have a quick temper and their attitude is rough, they are actually a very humble person and value hard work.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Tsugumi Umatachi":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Tsugumi_Umatachi

title: kitsugai_sese
body:
The "Corpse in Search of Itself". Stage 1 boss of [[Reactivate Majestical Imperial]].

A gashadokuro who excavates the underground searching for bones in order to became stronger and regain their original form. 

h4. See also

* [[Ex-Sese]]

title: taira_no_chouki
body:
The "New Emperor Amidst the Heat Haze". Stage 6 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

A relative and servant of [[Taira no Fumikado]]. Killed themself in order to control the Saeda Flute neccesary for their plans to become "the True Emperor", but became a ghost instead. Now an evil spirit, they want revenge on Fumikado for abandoning them, joining [[Ogata Garaiya]]'s Dragonfly Army.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Taira no Chouki":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Taira_no_Chouki

title: fujiwara_no_shirogane_no_sanra
body:
The "Imperial Capital's Silver Bullet". Stage 5 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

Sanra works as the field marshal of the Imperial Military in Mugenri. They serve under [[Ooama no Ake no Mitori]], and were the former fifth successor to the throne before Mitori's coup d'etat. Sanra has incredible accuracy, and can always pinpoint when and where to fire at their target.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Fujiwara no Shirogane no Sanra":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Fujiwara_no_Shirogane_no_Sanra

* [[U.A. cheerleader uniform]]

title: big_the_cat
body:
A character that appears in the [[Sonic (Series)|Sonic the Hedgehog]] series. He's a [i]big[/i] purple anthropomorphic [[cat]] who loves to [[fishing|fish]].

He's always seen with his best pal [[froggy (sonic)|Froggy]]. He made his first appearance in [[Sonic Adventure]] in the [[fishing]] minigame. He was designed by [[Uekawa Yuji]] and is voiced by Jon-st John, Oliver Wyman, and Kyle Herbert. Since he's such a laughable character he quickly became [[meme]] status within the fandom.

h4. External links

* "Sonic Wiki: Big the Cat":[https://sonic.fandom.com/wiki/Big_the_Cat]
other_names: ビッグ・ザ・キャット

title: nec_pc-8801
body:
A line of Japanese 8-bit [[computer|personal computers]] made by NEC from 1981 to 1989, otherwise commonly referred to as the PC-88. It's the predecessor to the [[PC-98 (computer)|]] line of computers.

This tag is for depictions of the computer itself. For images in the style of the PC-88's graphics, see the [[PC-88 (style)]] tag.

body: The [[official alternate costume|3rd costume]] of [[Nanashi Inc.]]'s [[Kojo Anna]].

title: aoki_ruri
body: Main Character of [[Ruri Dragon]]. Aoki Ruri is a normal girl who wakes up one day with a pair of [[horns]] on her head. According to her mother, Ruri's father, whom she has never met before, is a [[dragon]] and Ruri is only half human.

title: shitodo_aoji
body:
The "Weak-Willed Youngest Child". Stage 2 boss of [[Evanescent Existence]].

A shy [[androgynous]] magician who was abducted by [[Senri Tsurubami]] along with their siblings [[Shitodo Kuroji|Kuroji]] and [[Shitodo Hooaka|Hooaka]]. Has the power to create whirlpools and summon beasts.

Aoji is shown as being gentle at heart, but also rather meek and withdrawn. They're friendly and respectful towards everyone, but they don't have a very proactive personality.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Aoji Shitodo":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Aoji_Shitodo

title: sasha_(shounin_yuusha_wa_isekai_wo_gyuujiru)
body:
Sasha is a female magician in [[shounin_yuusha_wa_isekai_wo_gyuujiru|Shounin Yuusha wa Isekai wo Gyuujiru]]. She is a freelancing magic item researcher and got later on hired by [[akina_shoji|Akina Shoji]].

She has very long black hair with partially blue tips and to either side protuding stands which split up in the end. Her eyes are red and she wears earring with a red-orange stone hanging on a short chain. She is dressed in a long black dress which also fades into blue with the same color as her hair. She wears a black corset and a short white cape over it. She furthermore wears a belt with a dark blue fox tail with light blue tips, hanging in front of her.

title: maine_(shounin_yuusha_wa_isekai_wo_gyuujiru)
body:
Maine also known as "Weapon Killer" is a female adventurer in [[shounin_yuusha_wa_isekai_wo_gyuujiru|Shounin Yuusha wa Isekai wo Gyuujiru]]. She got hired as escort by [[Akina Shoji]].

She is a small build female with waist long blue hairs, orange-red eyes and a matching ribbon over her left ear. Also, she ties her hair to a small braid below said ear. She is dressed in a white dress with puffy shoulders, a leather belt with red fabric hanging off and a leather breastplate. She also wears  white thigh highs and both leather gloves and boots with greatly widenend entraces.

title: ooama_no_ake_no_mitori
body:
The "Throne Dyed in Vermillion". Stage 6 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

Current emperor of Devanagara, a country within Mugenri. Originally they were the third successor to the throne but organized a coup d'état after becoming disgusted with the corruption of the Fujiwara Dynasty. Is relatives with [[Fujiwara no Iyozane]] and [[Fujiwara no Shirogane no Sanra]].

title: heart_to_penis_(meme)
body: A comic template where three people are forming a [[heart hands trio]], with two people on the sides and one at the bottom forming the point of the heart. The bottom person then closes their hands so a penis is formed instead, with the other two forming the [[testicles|balls]]. One of the ball-formers recoils and grabs their own hand in horror while the other starts beating the prankster.

title: sin_mal
body: Sin Mal is a sadist who enjoys spilling the blood of her enemies, especially those from Schicksal. She thinks very highly of herself and doesn't like competition from others. Originally shown in [[benghuai xueyuan|Guns Girl School DayZ]], she later makes a few appearances in [[Honkai Impact 3rd]].

title: shion_(len'en)
body:
The "An Individual Born from the Aggregate". Stage 6 boss of [[Reactivate Majestical Imperial]].

A cute, [[androgynous]] youkai born from the soul-eater flower Harujion. Upon awakening, they were adopted by [[Enraku Tsubakura]] and [[Houlen Yabusame]].

Shion has the power to absorb and control souls. Likes to eat people's souls and is very interested in consuming Tsubakura's.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Shion":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Shion

body:
The player protagonist of [[Shoukan Yuusha to F-kei Kareshi]] (F-kare). Yuji Ono is his default name and can be changed in the game.

He is summoned to a fanstasy world named Midearth as The Hero to save the people from the Demon Lord.

title: bronya_zaychik_(snowy_sniper)
body:
Once belonged to [Ural Silver Wolf], the warm plush jacket can cope with the harsh environment of Siberia, but it can't warm the girl's cold heart.

In 2000, the Siberian region was caught in civil war due to the second Houkai. The orphans in the war were mostly adopted by warlords and cultivated into killing machine without feelings. [Ural Silver Wolf] is one of them. In her last assassination mission, the [Ural Silver Wolf] was failed during Cocolia assassination mission and was taken to the Cocolia Orphanage - and the life of [[Bronya Zaychik]] starts from here.
Bronya still retains this dress to commemorate the time spent in the orphanage.

title: zao_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

Zaou is the leader of the Shinjuku Academy Scouts and knows everything there is to know about hiking. He does part time jobs around Shinjuku and Ikebukuro while pitting himself against the mountains of other worlds that have appeared in Tokyo. Whenever he's not working, he's up in the mountains, resulting in dangerously slow attendance rate at school. The third eye on his forehead gives him a sixth sense that shows him the right path to survival even on the most treacherous of mountains. He is extremely strict on anyone who underestimates or desecrates mountains.

Designed by [[Amamiya (ammami8)|]].

h4. External Links

* "Housamo Wiki: Zaou":[https://housamo.wiki/Zaou]

title: melusine_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A dragon in maid form who works for the Roppongi Guild. Once queen of a castle back in her home world where she was renowned of her beauty, wealth, and power both in political sway and military might. However, she was never blessed with love, and she wandered away from her territory in search of it. In the end, she suffered rejection and the mental trauma that comes of such hurt. When she could wander no more, she found herself in Tokyo where she met the Roppongi Guild master whom she came to idolize. She would do absolutely anything for this man she calls Master. She and the butler of the Ikebukuro Guild are sworn enemies, calling each other such harsh names as Codependent Buffoon and Nuclear Landmine. They have a habit of trying to kill each other every chance they get while insults fly about like curses.

Designed by [[Amamiya (ammami8)|]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Melusine":https://housamo.wiki/Melusine

title: zabaniyya_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A martial artist who has mastered the Fiery Spear Hand. He is a Transient who specializes in torture and can inflict internal burns on a victim. Furthermore, he is a tool of the heavens who prioritizes divine law above his Summoner's orders and his own will. He deals with everyone politely and even sinners are no exception. Knowing he is not omnipotent, he is ashamed at the arrogance of his dealing judgment upon others. He defines himself as a tool to be used by others and tries to remain emotionless. He deals the same pain to himself that he inflicts upon sinners as a means of maintaining balance within himself.

Designed by [[Naop (anything)|]].

h4. Costumes

* [[zabaniyya (fashionista suit) (housamo)|Fashionista Suit]]
* [[zabaniyya (fashionista swimsuit) (housamo)|Fashionista Swimsuit]]
* [[zabaniyya (halloween) (housamo)|Halloween]]

h4. External Links

* "Housamo Wiki: Zabaniyya":[https://housamo.wiki/Zabaniyya]

body: Specific variant of [[crying cat (meme)|]], also known as Yamero Cat. Based on a photoshopped picture of a cat screaming with tears in its eyes.

title: shennong_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

Transient specialist in poisons and chemical substances. He excels greatly in academics, has a lively curiosity, and possesses both a cheerful personality and leadership. However, it's said that he has a bad habit of quickly sticking everything into his mouth to taste test for poison. Perhaps because of that he's often seen having stomach pains, but he never learns from the experience. His hobby is agriculture, he possesses a small scale experimental farm, and he seems to make various shady literary works. He's a part of the guild of war makers that rule Western Tokyo, the Warmongers. Shennong maintains the front line chemistry creature fighting force and serves as a military doctor. His personality is one who can't leave alone "people who hurt themselves without meaning to", and if that is mental pain that his power cannot reach, he worries about those people even more. But when it comes to people who hurt themselves willingly, he seems to dislike them as people similar to himself.

Designed by [[Goshiki]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Shennong":[https://housamo.wiki/Shennong]

title: tanetomo_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

Transient from the world of Wa no Kuni. He is a calm strategist and a composed assassin who is seen working for the guild he is a part of, though this is only one facet to him. He's a person with many sides to him, giving eccentric speeches to his surroundings and being famed as a passionate and skillful ritual dancer. These are all components that make up the complex character that is Tanetomo, and those who misread him are prone to meet their doom. Tanetomo specializes in surrendering his leadership, binding the choices of his opponents, and manipulating them into his hands. On a tactical level he gets on well with those who treat him as a charming commodity. He holds a mix of pity and sympathy for people who get lost in destructive love.

Designed by [[Kinoshita Jiroh]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Tanetomo":[https://housamo.wiki/Tanetomo]

title: benten_(housamo)
body:
A [[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

An artistic high school girl with an interest in subculture who is also a celestial maiden living in Nakano Ward. She is excessively confident in her own aesthetics and is also somewhat off-balance, mentally. Her hobbies include taking selfies and going to trendy cafes, vintage clothing stores, and art galleries. She constantly brings up her glory days as a goddess on the treasure ship and insists on being a guide to your party. She is good at influencing others but is also easily influenced herself, and very jealous, to boot. Her sworn enemy is a certain doujin artist from the Akihabara Guild. They have a habit of calling each other names such as Geeky Loser and Wannabe Non-conformist.

Designed by [[Daihukudokoro]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Benten":https://housamo.wiki/Benten

title: aegir_(housamo)
body:
A [[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A giant Transient with a snow-white beard, Aegir rules over the living, man-eating ocean known as Ran which spans across Yggdrasil. Aegir loves treasure above all else, and has devoted himself to seeking it out. Because of this, he has a vast knowledge about priceless treasure, as well as a keen eye for it. Aegir's interests lie not only in gold, but in all things that sparkle. He has a childish personality, lacking patience when he desires something and lighting up at any compliments to his collection.

Designed by [[Gomtang]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Aegir":https://housamo.wiki/Aegir

title: tezcatlipoca_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A Transient from the world of El Dorado. He is also one of the leaders of the guild that rules Western Tokyo, the Warmongers. He uses the luchadores who offered him their faith in his homeworld as his soldiers, and he stands at the forefront of the battles against the other guilds. Tezcatlipoca always appears to be promoting himself, and his character is the very image of being calm and collected. When it comes to the act of sacrificing one's body for the sake of a war for the world, he is endowed with a severe level of faith in it. When he arrived at his homeworld's creation he lost most of his body, starting with his right foot. His current appearance is a virtual image projected by his mirror, so he can freely change its appearance. His specialty is in transforming into many different forms and running disturbance tactics against his enemies. As he also excels at night warfare, he also transforms into a nocturnal spider form that he likes. This seems to baffle the one who was turned into a spider against their will. On the other hand, since this doesn't work on people who don't rely on their sight, he has trouble with them.

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Tezcatlipoca":[https://housamo.wiki/Tezcatlipoca]

title: houzouin_oniwaka
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A notorious Tokyo ruffian who swings around a big and heavy Polearm Sacred Artifact. He was taken in by a temple when he was abandoned as a child and believes that violence validates his existence, so he goes around hunting other players along with their powers.

Designed by [[BomBom]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Oniwaka":[https://housamo.wiki/Oniwaka]

title: seth_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

To those who make an enemy of Seth, he is a terrifying, merciless destroyer, but to those he deems allies, he pledges his vast powers as protection. His Sacred Artifact has the power to control chaos. Depending on how it is utilized, it can wreak absolute destruction, though destruction is, in itself, a new beginning. All things have both a light side and a dark, and chaos is no exception. Seth believes that mastering his Sacred Artifact will bring him one step closer to his goals.

Designed by [[TOOMIRO]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Seth":[https://housamo.wiki/Seth]

title: fenrir_(housamo)
body:
A [[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A wolf Transient who is never trusting, yet very gullible. He paints himself into a corner and then says, ""See? Now you'll betray me, right?"" In other words, he has a subconscious desire to be tied down and is generally a pain to deal with. He claims that he can withstand any sort of pain, and true to his words, is actually extremely resilient. He has long lost siblings: a little brother who has no concept of personal space, and a little sister who falls in love easily but goes crazy...literally. He's extremely easy to befriend if you show him sincerity.

Designed by [[Kinoshita Jiroh]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Fenrir":[https://housamo.wiki/Fenrir]

title: andvari_(housamo)
body:
[[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A Transient who belongs to the short-statured fey race known as dwarves. He loves money and treasure. Since coming to this Tokyo that has become intersected with other worlds, he's ventured into one shady business after another. Recently, he's been frequenting the underground Colosseum of the Ikebukuro Guild as book keeper and to sell items of suspect origins.

Designed by [[bombom]].

h4. External Links

* "Housamo Wiki: Andvari":[https://housamo.wiki/Andvari]

title: triton_(housamo)
body:
A [[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

A teacher at Shinjuku Academy. In contrast to [[jinn_(housamo)|Jinn]], who has a dynamic personality and takes a laid back approach with students, Triton is of a serious nature and is quite strict with rules. A merman, and thus good in aquatic environments, he also acts as advisor to the water polo and swim teams. Triton harbors a deep respect for Mr. [[mononobe kyoma|Mononobe]], another colleague of his.

Designed by [[bombom]].

h4. External links

* "Housamo Wiki: Triton":[https://housamo.wiki/Triton]

title: surtr_(housamo)
body: [[Tokyo Afterschool Summoners]] character.

title: sophitia_alexandra
body:
Character in the [[SoulCalibur]] series of fighting games. She is a mainstay of the [i]SoulCalibur[/i] series and one of most iconic characters in the franchise.

Sophitia is a benevolent, faithful, selfless, and strong-willed young woman who is devoted to her family and will do anything to protect them by all means, even if it means sacrificing her own life. She was sent on a holy quest by Hephaestus, Greek god of the Forge, to destroy [[soul edge (weapon|Soul Edge]]. The affair soon affected her other family members as well, including her sister, [[Cassandra Alexandra|Cassandra]], and later her children, [[Pyrrha Alexandra|Pyrrha]] and [[Patroklos Alexander|Patroklos]]. 

Sophitia has pale skin and [[long_hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] that is usually tied in a [[braid]]. She looks like a greek heroine, most of her attire consists of a [[dress]] matched with [[shoulder pads]] and [[vambraces]]. She is usually depicted wielding a short [[sword]] and a round [[shield]].

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Sophitia Alexandra":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sophitia_Alexandra
* "Soulcalibur Wiki: Sophitia":http://soulcalibur.wikia.com/wiki/Sophitia
other_names: ソフィーティア・アレクサンドル

title: lop_(sugiyuu)
body: Original character by スギユウ ([[Sugiyuu]]). Name confirmation from artist's Twitter: https://twitter.com/sugiyuu/status/1110904957966782471

title: male_playboy_bunny
body:
A boy, especially an [[otoko no ko]], [[crossdressing]] as a [[Playboy bunny]].

Male Playboy bunnies may wear a [[tuxedo]]-like outfit instead of a [[leotard]], since the Playboy bunny's outfit is based on the tuxedo. Some depictions may instead combine Playboy bunny motifs with a typical [[Chippendales]] uniform for a more masculine equivalent.

h4. See also

* [[Chippendales]] - Similar uniform.
* [[reverse bunnysuit]]- A memetic reverse outfit that resembles a Playboy bunny outfit.
* [[Playboy bunny]] - Female variant.

title: discipline_enforcer_a1
body:
In comparison to her other form [[Ai-chan (honkai Impact)|]] this is her original form in the Old World in which she possesses an adult body with very feminine features draped in a backless dress. She is a character that appears in the [[Honkai Impact 3rd]] game.

Discipline Enforcer A1 is the most powerful valkyrja in the game with initial SSS rank, and also the only character that can be promoted to SSSSS rank.

title: kirisame_marisa_(seihou)
body:
An alternate appearance of [[Kirisame Marisa]] as she appears in her cameo role as sub-boss of the Extra Stage of the [[Seihou]] game [i]Shuusou Gyoku[/i].

Visibly notable traits include wearing a black dress with a black shawl, a white bow on the back, and white angel wings instead of a broom. Given the wings, this version is often seen as a possible depiction of Marisa's future as a Magician Youkai.

title: bronya_zaychik_(black_nucleus)
body: [[Honkai Impact 3rd]] character.

title: raiden_mei_(lightning_empress)
body: "Lightning Empress" is one of [[raiden_mei|Mei]]'s signature battlesuits. Complete with skulls and glowing purple armour of unknown origins, the buckler around her waist contains the power of lightning. This Psychic type battlesuit perfectly displays the superiority of Mei's quick attacks. Upon an ultimate evasion, her Lightning Speed skill can trigger a lightning aura that will spark electricity and paralyse enemies caught in range.

title: bronya_zaychik_(yamabuki_armor)
body: Yamabuki Armor is a Third generation Valkyrie battlesuit worn by [[Bronya Zaychik]], and part of the "Ranged Support Specialist Battlesuit" series that feautres Honkai-powered protective shielding. The shielding is centred around the wearer and is capable of defending against most solid projectiles or particle beam weapon attacks. Although it stands out from other combat-themed battlesuits Bronya still decided to pin a HOMU badge on the collar.

title: bronya_zaychik_(dimension_breaker)
body: Elegant and lovely, with a youthful hooded dress, and fairy-tale leprechaun wings... Being able to combine these very children elements skilfully, it can be seen that [[bronya_zaychik|Bronya]] has put a lot of thought into this dress.

title: ikamusume
body:
The main character from the manga/anime [[Shinryaku! Ikamusume]]. Her name literally means "[[squid]] girl" in English.

The self-proclaimed "guardian of the sea". Ikamusume emerges from the ocean to "invade" the humanity, only to be subdued by [[Aizawa Chizuru]] and was forced to work inside the Aizawa family's seaside restraurant.

Like a [[squid]], she has an ability to control her [[tentacles]]-shaped hair for various purposes and is also capable of spraying [[ink]].

She is voiced by [[Kanemoto Hisako]] in Japanese and [[Christine Marie Cabanos]] in English.

Known for ending her sentences with [i]"de geso"[/i] or [i]"ika"[/i].

title: cindy_campbell
body:
A character from the manga/anime [[Shinryaku! Ikamusume]].

Keeps trying to prove that [[Ikamusume]] is an alien.

title: raiden_mei_(shadow_dash)
body:
Shadow Dash is [[raiden_mei|Mei]]'s anti-humanoid focused battlesuit with homage to the Far East's "samurai". 

She sacrifices top end speed for higher defensive capabilities due to almosta full set of plated armour including additional furnishings to help stave off any ranged or melee attacks. In doing so she also employs usage of "shadows" that are summoned temporal clones of herself that bait out opponents attacks meanwhile Mei herself can backstab them while their focus is on the "shadow".

title: raiden_mei_(valkyrie_bladestrike)
body: The Valkyrie Bladestrike battlesuit is [[raiden_mei|Mei]]'s special Schicksal Far East Branch Valkyrie uniform. The battlesuit itself sacrificed armour plating for higher mobility due to lighter materials utilised and minimal strain on the user's body. The sleeves are woven using special fibres with the ability to deflect bladed attacks which further enhances Mei's defensive abilities, and mobility in melee battles.

title: kiana_kaslana_(valkyrie_ranger)
body: When wearing the Ranger uniform, [[kiana_kaslana|Kiana]] would adopt a ranged fighting style instead of her melee-heavy gun-kata. With the addition of the ammunition belt wrapped around her hips she is able to stay in combat for longer periods of time.

title: aizawa_eiko
body:

[[Ikamusume]]'s long-suffering straight man.

title: peonia's_mother_(pokemon)
body:
The unnamed mother of [[Peonia (Pokemon)|]] and wife of [[Peony (Pokemon)|]] in [i][[Pokemon SwSh|Pokémon Sword and Shield]][/i]. She only appears in Peony's Rare [[League Card]].

Her design is an edit of the [[Beauty (Pokemon)|]] trainer class.

h4. External links

* "Bulbapedia: Peony's Rare League Card":[https://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/File:League_Card_Peony_rare.png]

title: para_(len'en)
body:
The "Stolen Omniscience and Omnipotence". Stage 5 boss of [[Brilliant Pagoda or Haze Castle]].

An oni who was captured by [[Taira no Fumikado]]'s grandfather and forced to swap bodies with Fumikado for their plans to become the True Emperor. Now trapped in a mutated human body that's almost close to a homunculus, Para allied with [[Taira no Chouki]] in order to get revenge on Fumikado for ruining their life.

h4. See also

* [[Para (len'en) (oni)]]

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Para":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Para

title: backbeako_(torotei)
body:
Popular [[Gegege no Kitarou]] fanmade character. She is a non-canonical daughter of [[Backbeard]], created in 2005 by artist [[Torotei]]. Her birthday is the eleventh of September.

Formerly known simply as Beako changed her name (see post #5796345) to make it easier to search for the character, to separate her from other characters also referred to as Beako (such as [[Beatrice (re:zero)|]]).

h4. See also

* [[Kono lolicon domome]]

h4. External links

* "Know Your Meme entry: Beako":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/beako]
* "Pixiv Encyclopedia entry: Beako":[https://dic.pixiv.net/a/ベア子]
other_names: ベア子(バックベアードの娘)

title: beatrice_(re:zero)
body:
A character from [[Re:Zero Kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu]]. Also known as "Beako" for short.

Beatrice has [[blue eyes]] with [[butterfly-shaped pupils]] and [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] stylized in [[twin drills]] with [[parted bangs]] & [[sidelocks]]. She wears [[pink ribbon|pink]] [[hair ribbon]]s, a [[red capelet|red]] [[fur-trimmed capelet]], [[red dress|red]] [[frilled dress]] with [[wide sleeves|wide]] [[frilled sleeves]], a pink [[neck ribbon]], [[pink bow|pink]] [[dress bow]], [[striped legwear|striped]] [[thighhighs]], and a [[mini crown]]. Usually is [[holding book|holding a book]].

She is voiced by [[Arai Satomi]].

h4. External links

* "Re:Zero Wiki: Beatrice":https://rezero.fandom.com/wiki/Beatrice

title: shitodo_kuroji
body:
The "Ambiguously Paper-thin Archeologist". Stage 5 boss of [[Evanescent Existence]] and later a recurring playable character.

An [[androgynous]] scholar who was abducted by [[Senri Tsurubami]] along with their siblings [[Shitodo Hooaka|Hooaka]] and [[Shitodo Aoji|Aoji]]. While originally a normal human, they gained the power to reverse things.

Kuroji sees [[Enraku Tsubakura]] as a rival, and the two often bicker. Despite this however, Kuroji sees Tsubakura as firmly above them. 

Kuroji aims to build a schoolhouse as a means of making money. To raise money for this and spread their name, they work as a youkai exterminator. They are prone to using immoral methods to reach their goals, such as blackmailing [[Adagumo no Saragimaru]] into being their servant, or extorting [[Fujiwara no Iyozane]] and [[Taira no Fumikado]] for their money.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Kuroji Shitodo":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Kuroji_Shitodo

title: shitodo_hooaka
body:
The "Cool-Headed Hot-Heeled Thermal Runaway". Stage 4 boss of [[Evanescent Existence]].

An eccentric [[androgynous]] magician who was abducted by [[Senri Tsurubami]] along with their siblings [[Shitodo Kuroji|Kuroji]] and [[Shitodo Aoji|Aoji]]. Has the power to control certain elements, but apparently their strong point is heat magic.

Hooaka is a carefree person, whose personality changes depending on the mood of the situation. They are so carefree that they don't care much about Kuroji's amoral methods to gain money or bothering to remember Aoji's name.

h4. External links

* "Len'en Wiki: Hooaka Shitodo":http://lenen.shoutwiki.com/wiki/Hooaka_Shitodo

title: sekhmet_of_death
body: [[Last Origin]] character. Designed by [[Snowball22]]

body: [[Last Origin]] character. Designed by [[obui]]

title: mizuno_ami
body:
The blue-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] (aka. Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon) by [[Takeuchi Naoko]], who transforms into [[Sailor Mercury]]. She is considered a genius schoolgirl, but gradually opens up to hanging out with her friends more.

Voiced by [[Hisakawa Aya]] in the 90s anime, and [[Kanemoto Hisako]] in Crystal.

title: sailor_moon
body:
She is one of the [[Sailor Senshi|Inner Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]].

Her powers are related to Light and Love. She goes through many trials and gains various powers throughout the series.

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Moon]]
* [[Eternal Sailor Moon]]
* [[Tsukino Usagi]]
* [[Sailor Moon pose]]
* [[Tsuki Ni Kawatte Oshioki Yo]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Sailor Moon":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sailor_Moon_(character)
other_names: セーラームーン(キャラクター)

title: chibi_usa
body:
The pink-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. She is also the future daughter of [[Tsukino Usagi]] and [[Chiba Mamoru]].

When she first appears, she is a small child from the 30th century who visits the past to seek help from the series' primary heroines, the [[Sailor Senshi]]. She later returns, a few years older, in order to train as a Senshi herself — [[Sailor Chibi Moon]].

Note that her full name is [b]Tsukino Usagi[/b], the exact same as her mother's. She is given the nickname [b]Chibi Usa[/b] in order to differentiate between the two Usagis. 'Chibi' means 'small', while 'usa' is the first part of her full name, so it means 'small Usagi'.

Voiced by Araki Kae in the 90s anime, and [[Fukuen Misato]] in Crystal.

h4. See also

* [[Black Lady (sailor Moon)|]]
* [[Small Lady Serenity]]
* [[Super Sailor Chibi Moon]]
* [[Super Sailor Chibi Moon (Stars)]]

title: tomoe_hotaru
body:
The short black-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. With the introduction of her character, she was quite an ill and lonely child. She is the daughter of [[Tomoe Souichi]] - a Professor. She also became close friends with [[Chibi Usa]]. Hotaru is revealed to be the final planetary [[Sailor Senshi]], [[Sailor Saturn]], who was sealed away because she had the power to destroy the world.

Hotaru's history consists of sporadic powers, fluctuating aging, and even being reborn as an infant. She is one of the characters whose outward appearance is mistaken quite often.

Voiced by [[Minaguchi Yuuko]] in the 90s anime, and [[Fujii Yukiyo]] in Crystal in the Japanese Language and in English, as of the Viz Media Redubs, [[Christine Marie Cabanos]].

h4. See also

* [[Mistress 9]]

title: tsukino_usagi
body:
The [[blonde hair|yellow]]  [[double bun]]-haired protagonist of the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. She is a carefree schoolgirl who is often absent-minded, lazy, and a cry-baby. But she is also a good friend and stepped up many times to help others in distress.

She was found by a black cat named [[Luna (sailor_moon)|]], to become the [[Sailor Senshi|Inner Senshi]] known as [[Sailor Moon]] the "Soldier of Love". 

Her hairstyle is largely associated with her, thus making her one of the most immediately recognizable and iconic anime characters worldwide.

Voiced by [[Mitsuishi Kotono]] in both the 90s anime and Crystal. She is the only voice actor to reprise her role in Crystal.

h4. External links

* "Sailor Moon Wiki: Tsukino Usagi":http://www.wikimoon.org/index.php?title=Usagi_Tsukino

title: hino_rei
body:
The black-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] (aka. Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon) by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. She is a [[miko|Shinto priestess]] and schoolgirl. She also has psychic abilities and two crow companions named [[phobos (sailor moon)|Phobos]] and [[deimos (sailor moon)|Deimos]]. 

Her personality is different depending on the version; in the original manga and [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Crystal|Sailor Moon Crystal]] she is quiet and somewhat aloof, but in the 1992 anime she is more of a [[tsundere]] with a fiery temper.

Voiced by Tomizawa Michie in the 90s anime, and [[Satou Rina]] along with [[Cristina Valenzuela]] in Japanese and English in Crystal.

title: sailor_pluto
body:
Sailor Pluto is one of the [[Outer Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]].

She has power over both time and space, and wields the [[Garnet Rod]] bearing the Garnet Orb, which is one of three talismans carried by the Outer Senshi. After leaving her post later in the series, she teams up with [[Sailor Neptune]] and [[Sailor Uranus]]. Her civilian identity is [[Meiou Setsuna]].

Note that Pluto was considered a planet during the making of Sailor Moon. It was not classified as a dwarf planet until afterwards.

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Pluto]]
* [[Super Sailor Pluto (Stars)]]

title: sailor_neptune
body:
She is one of the [[Outer Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. Neptune uses ocean-based attacks (not just water), and carries one of three Talismans carried by the Outer Senshi. Neptune has the [[Deep Aqua Mirror]], which always reveals the truth. Her civilian identity is [[Kaiou Michiru]].

Neptune is fully dedicated to her duty as a Senshi and fights alongside her partner and lover [[Sailor Uranus]].

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Neptune]]
* [[Super Sailor Neptune (Stars)]]
other_names: セーラーネプチューン

title: sailor_uranus
body:
She is one of the [[Outer Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. Uranus has the power to control and manipulate the forces of the air. She also carries the [[Space Sword]], which is one of three talismans carried by the Outer Senshi. Her civilian name is [[Ten'ou Haruka]].

She is quite protective of [[Tsukino Usagi]], and is the partner and lover of [[Sailor Neptune]].

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Uranus]]
* [[Super Sailor Uranus (Stars)]]

title: sailor_chibi_moon
body:
She is one of the [[Sailor Senshi]] in training from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. Her civilian identity is Tsukino Usagi, but to differentiate her from her mother who has the exact same name, she goes by [[Chibi Usa]]. A common gag in the anime's third story arc is how Chibi Moon's Pink Sugar Heart Attack doesn't always work properly.

h4. See also

* [[Small Lady Serenity]]
* [[Super Sailor Chibi Moon]]
* [[Super Sailor Chibi Moon (Stars)]]

title: sailor_venus
body:
Sailor Venus is one of the [[Inner Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. She uses love- and metal-related powers and also serves as the leader of the Guardian Senshi who protect Sailor Moon. Her civilian identity is [[Aino Minako]].

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Venus]]
* [[Super Sailor Venus (Stars)]]
* [[Sailor V]]

title: sailor_jupiter
body:
Sailor Jupiter is one of the [[Inner Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. She is able to manipulate electricity and uses some plant-based powers. Her civilian name is [[Kino Makoto]].

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Jupiter]]
* [[Super Sailor Jupiter (Stars)]]

title: sailor_mars
body:
Sailor Mars is one of the [[Inner Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. Her powers are associated with [[fire]], and she uses her psychic abilities to enhance her power. Her civilian identity is [[Hino Rei]].

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Mars]]
* [[Super Sailor Mars (Stars)]]

title: sailor_mercury
body:
She is one of the [[Inner Senshi]] from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]. Her powers are associated with phases of water, particularly ice, and she can use her supercomputer to quickly analyze a foe in battle. Her civilian name is [[Mizuno Ami]].

h4. See also

* [[Super Sailor Mercury]]
* [[Super Sailor Mercury (Stars)]]
other_names: セーラーマーキュリー

title: kaiou_michiru
body:
The teal-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] (aka. Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon) by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. She is an an artistic schoolgirl, with a talent for painting and playing the violin.

Voiced by [[Katsuki Masako]] in the 90s anime, and [[Oohara Sayaka]] in Crystal.

title: ten'ou_haruka
body:
The dark blond-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] (aka. Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon) by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. She is a [[tomboy|masculine]] schoolgirl, who is a racecar driver. She can be quite distant and stubborn, but gradually warms up to others. She is quite protective of [[Tsukino Usagi]], and is the lover of [[Kaiou Michiru]]. 

Voiced by [[Ogata Megumi]] in the original series, and by [[Minagawa Junko]] in [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon Crystal]] along with [[Erica Mendez]] in Japanese and English.

title: aino_minako
body:
The blonde-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] (aka. Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon) by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. She is a cheerful schoolgirl full of energy and very interested in romance. She's accompanied by [[artemis_(sailor_moon)|Artemis]].

Takeuchi originally created her for a manga one-shot in 1991 that eventually became the series [[Codename wa Sailor V]], which chronicled Minako's adventures as [[Sailor V]]. She would later be introduced as [[Sailor Venus]] in the [i]Sailor Moon[/i] manga. Since she is essentially the prototype for [[Tsukino Usagi]], they look and sometimes act very similar.

Voiced by Fukami Rika in the 90s anime, and [[Itou Shizuka]] in Crystal.

title: meiou_setsuna
body:
The dark green-haired character from the series [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]] (aka. Pretty Soldier Sailor Moon) by [[Takeuchi Naoko]]. As a civilian she is a college student. She is very close to and fond of [[Chibi Usa]], who she refers to as [[small lady serenity|Small Lady]].

She is voiced by Kawashima Chiyoko in the 90s anime, and Maeda Ai in Crystal.

title: black_lady_(sailor_moon)
body:
After being captured by the Black Moon Clan, Death Phantom brainwashes [[Chibi Usa]] into thinking she is unloved by her family. The twisted memories cause her to transform into Black Lady; an [[aged up|older]] and [[dark persona|darker self]].

h4. See also

* [[Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon]]

title: selvaria_bles
body:
[[Senjou no Valkyria (series)]] character.

A proud, noble, yet distant woman of twenty-two years who serves Maximilian with absolute loyalty as a part of the Drei Stern. The blood of the legendary Valkyria flows in her veins, granting her superhuman powers in battle when she wields a special ragnite spear and shield.

At a young age she was held at an Imperial research facility, used as a test subject in their experiments until Maximilian rescued her. In the anime, it is revealed that Maximilian named Selvaria after a blue flower of the same name.

h4. Appearance

* !post #2000970

title: ex-keine
body:
The Hakutaku form of [[Kamishirasawa Keine]]. 

The nickname comes from the fact that Keine is the Extra Stage mid-boss (or "EX mid-boss" for short) of [i][[Imperishable Night]][/i] in this form. 

As a joke, fans commonly say "[[Caved (touhou)|]] by Ex-Keine."

h4.See also 

* [[Kamishirasawa Keine]] 
* [[Sukusuku Hakutaku]] 
* [[caved (touhou)|]]

title: seiran_(touhou)
body:
A [[moon rabbit]], and the stage 1 boss of [[Legacy of Lunatic Kingdom]]. Featured on the cover of the demo disc.

She has [[red eyes]], [[blue_hair|dark-blue hair]] and [[rabbit ears]] with an [[earclip]] on her right ear, and is carrying a [[kine]] (a type of [[mallet]]) with purple stains (though they appeared to be [[ambiguous_red_liquid|red]] in the demo).

She is part of the covert operations department of the  "Eagle Ravi" Earth investigation corps. She has the ability to fire bullets from other dimensions and is paid low wages despite her dangerous work.

h4. External links

* "Touhou Wiki: Seiran":http://en.touhouwiki.net/wiki/Seiran

title: queen_marika_the_eternal
body:
[b]Queen Marika, the Eternal[/b] is a major background character in [[Elden Ring]]. She is the original holder of the [[Elden Ring (object)|]] and the matriarch of various gods in the world.

She is the [[mature female|mother]] of [[godwyn the golden|Godwyn]], [spoilers][[margit the fell omen|Morgott]], and [[mohg lord of blood|Mohg]][/spoilers] with her first consort, [[godfrey first elden lord|Godfrey]], the mother of [[malenia blade of miquella|Malenia]] and [[Miquella (elden ring)|]] with her second consort, [[radagon of the golden order|Radagon]], and the mother of [[messmer the impaler|Messmer]] and [spoiler][[Melina (elden ring)|]][/spoiler] with an unknown father.

title: shikanoin_heizou
body:
[[Genshin Impact]] character. An Inazuman detective who works for the Tenryou Commission.

h4. Appearance

* !post #5356800

title: collei_(genshin_impact)
body:
A playable character in [[Genshin Impact]]. A Dendro Bow user from Sumeru. 

An introverted girl with a dark past. She made her debut in the manga and later appears in the game since the 3.0 Version Update. 

h4. See also

* [[Cuilein-anbar (Genshin Impact)|]]

title: gorou_(genshin_impact)
body:
[[Genshin Impact]] character.

A loyal and brave general of Watatsumi island. Born with a beast-like fighting intuition and tenacious will, he can find a way to victory even in the most critical moments. 

His name is pronounced [b]Goroo[/b] in the Japanese version of the game.

h4. See also

* [[Hina (genshin impact)|]]

title: lyney_(genshin_impact)
body:
[[Genshin Impact]] male character.

An young man magician part of the House of the Hearth with his twin sister, [[lynette_(genshin_impact)|Lynette]], and his adoptive brother [[freminet_(genshin_impact)|Freminet]].

As kids, they lived on the streets and did magic tricks to get money, but one day, after they were adopted by an aristocratic man who tried to traffic with his sister. They were rescued by [[arlecchino_(genshin_impact)|Arlecchino]], and joined them in the House of the Hearth, thus becoming Fatui spies.

title: yun_jin_(genshin_impact)
body:
[[Genshin Impact]] character.Character designed by "Weiwei (危危)":[https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Yun_Jin/Design]

The current director of the Yun-Han Opera Troupe and a famous figure in Liyue Harbor's opera scene. Despite performing in mostly traditional music and plays, she holds a secret love for intense genres of music like Xinyan's rock'n'roll.

Her Vision's element is Geo and she wields a polearm in battle.

Her name is pronounced [b]Unkin[/b] in the Japanese version of the game.

h4. Appearance

* !post #4931619

title: razor_(genshin_impact)
body:
[[Genshin Impact]] character.

Some say he is an orphan raised by wolves. Others say he is a wolf spirit in human form. He is most at home in the wild, fighting with claw and thunder. To this day the [[wolf boy]] can be found prowling the forest, where he and his wolf pack hunt to survive using nothing more than their animal instincts.

h4. Appearance

* !post #4729945

h4. See also

* [[List of Genshin Impact characters]]

h4. External links

* "Genshin Impact Wiki: Razor":[https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Razor]

title: yaoyao_(genshin_impact)
body:
A dendro [[Genshin Impact]] character.

She was [[Xiangling (genshin impact)|]]'s junior disciple under the same master chef, but has since become an assistant for [[Ganyu (genshin impact)|]].

body:
